Но все пак не ми харесва, че хората се ровят в миналото, използвайки личните си интереси. Бъди предпазлив! А дотогава помогни да спрем пиратите!
Новата ера

Нарастналият брой пиратски нападения и фактът, че се организират под влиянието на все по-силни лидери, са неблагоприятни за човечеството. Задачите ти са ясни. Дай им да разберат, че хората са издръжливи. Че ще се бием до последната капка кръв, за да спасим вида си. Нека да знаят, че сме сила, с която трябва да се съобразяват.
Какво предстои

Пилот! До нас достигна информация, че си изпълнявал мисии за Никс и UNN. Искаме да сме сигурни, че приемаш новината й за новия враг с известна доза съмнение, тъй като вече е ясно, че другите две фракции са истинските врагове. Разбра се, че UNN са просто марионетки на техния режим. Време е да разкрием картите!
Фалшиви новини

UNN непрекъснато реват, че колониите са били изкоренени, и ето, че дойде време да се възползваме от ситуацията. Призоваваме всички наши пилоти от отдалечените сектори, за да сме сигурни, че са готови да застанат в нашите редици. Да се бият за каузата! Да убиват за нас! Бъди силен, пилот! Ти символизираш нашата сила! Очевидно е, че времето не промени нищо при другите фракции. Просто са станали по-самонадеяни и беше ясно, че след нас и те трябва да се мобилизират. Сега резултатът е равен и не съм сигурен, че има друг изход освен война! Силните действия обаче могат да потушат техните намерения!
Призив за война

Ясно е, че времето не промени нещо при другите фракции. Просто са станали по-самонадеяни и беше ясно, че след нас и те трябва да се мобилизират. Сега резултатът е равен и не съм сигурен, че има друг изход освен война! Силните действия обаче могат да потушат техните намерения!
Времето не променя нищо

Чухме за престрелки между другите фракции. UNN съобщават, че вината е наша, когато е ясно, че това не е така. Не можем да открием местонахождението им и да ги спрем. Налице е и фактът, че са набелязали и унищожили някои от нашите по-отдалечени станции. Може би войната е неизбежна!
Престрелка!

Време е да заздравим военната си връзка, като сключим нанокървав пакт между всички членове на нашата фракция. Тогава ще можем да покажем на всеки, който ни изостави и ги проследи, какво значи възмездие. Защото на всички ни е ясно кой трябва да командва парада, а изпитаният метод за това на Земята е – смърт!
Военни облигации

Виждам, че още една организация е подала грозната си глава откакто говорихме за последно. Съветвам те да следиш Министреството по-отблизо. Имам усещането, че имат нерегламентирани връзки с миналото на човечеството и определено искат да бъдат част от нашето бъдеще, тъй като събират доказателства, с които биха могли да бъдат изнудвани големите организации. Време е за малко разузнаване!
Движеща сила

От изслеванията и събраните от теб данни мога да заключа, че Министерството представлява потенциална заплаха. Въпреки твърдението им, че са унищожили „кошмарите“, има ясни доказателства за непрекъснато изследване на отдалечените сектори. Без някой, който да ги спре, виждам масите да се изправят срещу всички тирани. Но сега има други по-големи заплахи.
Бунтът на масите

Разбирам, че гражданското въстание може да отнеме време. Въпреки това колкото по-бързо докажа на фирмите, че Министерството и останалите работят срещу интересите на човечеството, толкова по-бързо ще тръгнем по пътя на свободата. Да разбием оковите и да се опитаме да започнем нещо ново, нещо по-добро. Дотогава трябва да се справим с извънземните.
Дългата разходка

Казвал съм го и преди, но нещата там се промениха. Организациите са унищожени, а колониите на хората са заличени. Някой дърпа конците и влияе на фирмите, прави заговор и вследствие на това става разцепление. Предстои буря и е добре да прецениш дали си на правилната страна. Защото, когато тя се разрази, всичко ще се промени.
Идва буря

Ето защо отсега нататък всяка битка е проверка, всяка ситуация трябва да се анализира и трябва да подготвим всяка една възможност за пробуждане. Защото има нещо, което изпитва нашата решителност, разпръсквайки силите си сред нас и готвейки се за удар. А когато го направят, това ще бъде краят ни, ако не сме подготвени.
Освобождение

Тук е Министерството – предаваме от MTRY-6.18.4. Променихме си честотата, но се насочихме към пилоти, с които сме работили преди това, както и към тези, които проявяват склонност към този вид работа. Знаем, че нямаш търпение да се включиш в лова. Също така чухме, че в отдалечените сектори са били забелязани доста Demaner. Време е за действие!
Новини

Човечеството, във всичките му разнообразни форми, е нещо велико. Приключенията и изследванията имат определена чистота, която просто липсва при другите видове, които сме срещали. Важно е да споделяме този опит, за да продължим напред и да се развиваме като вид. С добро командване и ръководство.
Словото на мъдреците

Имай предвид, че се стремим само да подпомогнем създаването на нов ред за човечеството. Защото заедно сме по-силни. Дребните противоречия и задкулисните игри между различните фирми изобщо не ни помогнаха, докато вървяхме напред. Но едно съгласувано усилие би могло да ни превръне в доминираща сила в тази галактика.
Задкулисни игри

За всички е ясно, че в обществото съществуват извънземни влияния и виждаме, че хората вземат страната на извънземните. Променят се до наузнаваемост, за да изпълнят желанията си, но просто не успяват да видят цялостната картина. Макар тези бивши човеци да ни побеждават на наша територия, е важно да сме сигурни, че няма да не се огънем под тези атаки.
Запазване на контрол

В тази връзка ние сме отговорни за важната информация, изпратена към космоса в Demaner, когато проект Прераждане бе активиран по време на Тридневната война. Информация, която не само може да ни помогне в бъдеще, но също така ще доведе до ново разбиране на това какво значи да сме хора и какви можем да се стремим да бъдем.
Важна информация

Тази информация ще възвърне изгубеното наследство. Семейните истории и споразумения ще бъдат разкрити, а това ще ни позволи да разберем по-добре взетите решения. Така ще гарантираме, че ако споразуменията са били неправилни, ще предприемем действия за тяхното коригиране, а ако са били правилни, хората ще бъдат възнаградени за своите действия. За бъдещето на всички ни.
Наследството на времето

Разбира се, когато това се случи, ще помогнем, като ръководим всичко с нашите знания. Дай добър съвет на онези, които го търсят, и помогни да се идентифицират зараждащите се проблеми. Помогни за образоването и вдъхновяването на тези, които в миналото са се провалили. Трябва да работим здраво за целта, към която всички се стремим.
Изгодно положение

Сега не е времето за дребни обвинения. Тези, които ни нанесоха вреди, трябва да платят за извършените престъпления, но това също трябва и да изпрати сигнал към останалите, че вече няма да се толерират симпатизантите, които биха работили против общото благо. Министерството ще излезе с ясна визия за бъдещето.
Стига толкова

Заедно сме в мастиления мрак на космоса, а той може да бъде много самотно място, където някой често може да установи, че се бие с друг представител на същия вид, докато в действителност трябва заедно да се борят срещу общия ни враг – невежеството. Ще поправим нещата. Ще помощнем на тези, които държат нещата в своите ръце. Предстои ново бъдеще за човечеството.
Заедно с една обща цел

Поредното страхотно постижение, пилот. Броят на Demaner ще се стопи съвсем скоро. Запомни думите ни добре. Наистина вярваме, че можем да продължим по-нататък под един общ флаг – флагът на човечеството. Работата ти само засили нашата решителност и броят ни отново започна да нараства. Успех, докато се завърнем. Довери се на Министерството!
Властта е сила!

Тук е Министерството – предаваме от MTRY-6.18.4. Променихме си честотата, но се насочихме към пилоти, с които сме работили преди това, както и към тези, които проявяват склонност към този вид работа. Знаем, че нямаш търпение да се включиш в лова. Също така чухме, че в отдалечените сектори са били забелязани доста Demaner. Време е за действие!
Новини

Човечеството, във всичките му разнообразни форми, е нещо велико. Приключенията и изследванията имат определена чистота, която просто липсва при другите видове, които сме срещали. Важно е да споделяме този опит, за да продължим напред и да се развиваме като вид. С добро командване и ръководство.
Словото на мъдреците

Имай предвид, че се стремим само да подпомогнем създаването на нов ред за човечеството. Защото заедно сме по-силни. Дребните противоречия и задкулисните игри между различните фирми изобщо не ни помогнаха, докато вървяхме напред. Но едно съгласувано усилие би могло да ни превръне в доминираща сила в тази галактика.
Задкулисни игри

За всички е ясно, че в обществото съществуват извънземни влияния и виждаме, че хората вземат страната на извънземните. Променят се до наузнаваемост, за да изпълнят желанията си, но просто не успяват да видят цялостната картина. Макар тези бивши човеци да ни побеждават на наша територия, е важно да сме сигурни, че няма да не се огънем под тези атаки.
Запазване на контрол

В тази връзка ние сме отговорни за важната информация, изпратена към космоса в Demaner, когато проект Прераждане бе активиран по време на Тридневната война. Информация, която не само може да ни помогне в бъдеще, но също така ще доведе до ново разбиране на това какво значи да сме хора и какви можем да се стремим да бъдем.
Важна информация

Тази информация ще ни възвърне изгубеното наследство. Семейните истории и споразумения ще бъдат разкрити, а това ще ни позволи да разберем по-добре взетите решения. Действаме, за да сме сигурни, че там, където е сгрешено, ще предприемем коригиращи действия, а където е действано правилно, хората ще получават възнаграждение за семейните си стремежи. За бъдещето на всички ни.
Наследството на времето

Разбира се, когато това се случи, ще помогнем, като ръководим всичко с нашите знания. Дай добър съвет на онези, които го търсят, и помогни да се идентифицират зараждащите се проблеми. Помогни за образоването и вдъхновяването на тези, които в миналото са се провалили. Трябва да работим здраво за целта, към която всички се стремим.
Изгодно положение

Сега не е времето за дребни обвинения. Тези, които ни нанесоха вреди, трябва да платят за извършените престъпления, но това също трябва и да изпрати сигнал към останалите, че вече няма да се толерират симпатизантите, които биха работили против общото благо. Министерството ще излезе с ясна визия за бъдещето.
Стига толкова

Заедно сме в мастиления мрак на космоса, а той може да бъде много самотно място, където някой често може да установи, че се бие с друг представител на същия вид, докато в действителност трябва заедно да се борят срещу общия ни враг – невежеството. Ще поправим нещата. Ще помощнем на тези, които държат нещата в своите ръце. Предстои ново бъдеще за човечеството.
Заедно с една обща цел

Поредното страхотно постижение, пилот. Броят на Demaner ще се стопи съвсем скоро. Запомни думите ни добре. Наистина вярваме, че можем да продължим по-нататък под един общ флаг – флагът на човечеството. Работата ти само засили нашата решителност и броят ни отново започна да нараства. Успех, докато се завърнем. Довери се на Министерството!
Властта е сила!
Събирането на куба

Пилоте, нашите анализи показват, че кубиконите са си отишли от този сектор. Предполагам, че това не е точно така и затова сме готови да предоставим специално звание на онзи, който е готов да се опълчи срещу врага и след това да се завърне. Очакваме много, но наградата си заслужава.
Прочисти протегитите

Време е да отидеш в космоса и да премахнеш всички проблеми там, преди да са станали твърде сериозни. Говори се, че протегитите се размножават по-бързо от зайците на Земята. Затова се погрижи всичко това да остане в историята. Знаем, че те молим за пълно унищожение на всички тях, но честно казано, те го заслужават, а и наградите са добри. Много добри!
Раздразни Interceptor

Interceptor се превърнаха в огромен проблем в сектора ни. Изглежда, че се появяват от нищото, причиняват разрушения и хаос в товарните ни линии. Време е да сложим край на деянията им, като унищожим голяма част от тях. Това е сериозна задача, за която те очаква и сериозна награда. Както виждаш.
Химн на унищожението

Когато не действаш, Annihilator виждат в това възможност да започнат да действат те. Връщайки се в територията, ние я освободихме от хватката им. Ако поемеш тази мисия и разчистиш пътя за нашите кораби, ще ти бъдем повече от благодарни. Броят на убитите е висок, но наградата си заслужава.
Тих саботаж

Броят на саботьорите се увеличава и ние трябва да намалим това. Така ще помогнем на фракцията си и ще подкрепим човечеството. Не е известно кога ще се появят нови нападатели, затова трябва да държим броя им нисък.
Неограничен Uber

Ти си пилотът, който търсехме. Контролът докладва, че Uber Protegit са се превърнали в огромен проблем, тъй като водят със себе си други Protegit. Докажи им, че човечеството е по-силно. Унищожи голяма част от тях, след това се върни тук за наградата си.
Заличаване

Време е да докажеш уменията си и да унищожи вражеските кораби, които са там навън. Да, всичко, което откриеш освен нас, може да бъде унищожено. Това ще ни помогне да се утвърдим като доминираща сила в галактиката и да научим останалите на подчинение. Съгласен си, нали?
This is an emergency beacon *STOP* Virus synthesizing in VRU systems *STOP* Need assistance *STOP* Objectives identified *STOP*
Alert! *STOP* VRU systems infected *STOP* Communications systems failing *STOP* Please assist. *STOP*

Pilot. Something seems to have synthesized itself in our systems; a virus we thought we’d eradicated. It seems that it’s affecting numerous programs throughout the VRU so be careful out there and make sure you eliminate any threat we identify. If we can contain this threat quickly, it shouldn’t blow out of proportion.
Battling the Virus

We’ve been given special clearance to speak to you. Whilst you may be on the grubbier end of the spectrum it appears this virus is affecting us all. Therefore, on this one occasion your organization has revoked the Warbond and is allowing you to work for us. Be warned, pilot, we are monitoring your actions. Keep your nose clean.

We’ve agreed with your imperialist masters that you can work for us on this occasion. Please note we will be monitoring our assets carefully and be warned, if we are not united in our response, the virus could adapt and spread into all ship systems, leaving us open to attack. Often we have to take a path that is less beaten.

The virus seems to be spreading further. The same one that affected the P.E.T.s in the past, which is strange as our science division said they’d eradicated it. Because of the special circumstances and the threat to all humanities defense systems we’re going to also call in MMO and EIC pilots and suspend the Warbond.
Special Clearance

Not as efficient as VRU pilots by any stretch of the imagination but you’ve done the job. Although I think some training in etiquette would help, as our hanger staff have been complaining about oil marks in the docking bays. This virus is similar to the P.E.T. virus, which we thought we’d eradicated. Perhaps the EIC released a sample.

Although we appreciate your help, please don’t have ideas above your station. Whilst we’re happy for you to share our information this does not mean you can broadcast EIC propaganda throughout our space, so make sure you calm that shit down. Seems this virus is the one that affected P.E.T.s previously. Thought we’d killed that one.

If we can’t pin down this virus soon there’s no end to the damage it can cause. Four of our officers Augmented Reality headsets went on the blink, meaning they ejected themselves from an airlock because they thought they were heading to the refectory. It’s essential we pin this virus down as soon as possible.
Spread Mechanics

We’ve tracked down the reason this viral strain is spreading but not where it stemmed from. Although we think there have been equal problems in your organization. Still, this does not stop the fact that we need to stop this thing, and you MMO people are used to getting your hands dirty, so best you get on with it.

We may have some information about the release of the virus, and believe me, the EIC are just as much to blame. However, we still haven’t uncovered the root of the infection. Which is something we’ll be tasking you all with as we move forward. However, suppression of the infection is the first thing on the cards.

As embarrassing as it is for us to admit, it appears that the virus spread in our systems because one of our staff thought it would be very post-modern to make their password, ‘password’! A person who has now been incarcerated for a considerable period of time. So we’ll take some responsibility for the virus’ spread.
Reactivating the Strain

We’ve had a theory and want to test something out. We’re not sure if this will affect anything on your ship but, let’s face facts, you MMO are always talking about how tough you are. Best be prepared all the same as your blunt tactics are proving useful. Once you have resolved your objectives come back to us.

Every time you respond to us, it’s like we’re hearing a voice from the past. You must try and stop the EIC imperialist rot and just respond like a normal human being. We have a test for you to complete, it may be dangerous but that’s what you people are all about, isn’t it? Get out there and complete the objectives and tell us the results.

Our scientists have managed to pin down a flaw in the viral makeup so we can test some counter measures. Creating some areas where P.E.T.s don’t work. We need you to check this region out to confirm that everything is going according to plan and then destroy another two of the rogue P.E.T.s so we can gather samples in isolation.
Counter Measures

Not bad, pilot. A little bit direct, but you Martians are all the same. Keeping things simple and leaving the proper science to people like the great VRU. However, the theory we were testing hasn’t worked as expected. The virus has rebuffed some of our attempts and so we need more samples to discover what is controlling this infection.

You certainly make your point, pilot. Not the way we’d do it, a little bit too much derring-do rather than efficient logical thinking. You got the job done and so it’s now become clear that something else is controlling the virus, as our anti-viral program is not taking full effect. Time to investigate further and gather more evidence.

So part of that worked, part didn’t. We’re much closer to reestablishing vital systems throughout the VRU now, using the tech we discovered to aid their protection. The issue is what is controlling these damn P.E.T.s. We sent out an anti-virus and it just seems to have hit a brick wall. Better get us some more evidence to analyze.
Controlling Factor

Seems there’s an ‘Alpha’ out there who is controlling all the others. Which has seemingly created a backdoor into the rogue P.E.T.s systems. Meaning the only way to stop this viral infection is to kill the alpha and then deploy the anti-virus again, before anything can adapt. You’ll need to work hard, but that’s the MMO doctrine, isn’t it?

We’ve uncovered the root of the problem and it appears that there’s an alpha P.E.T. out there somewhere, which is managing to operate a backdoor in the rogue P.E.T.s you’ve encountered. It’s important we pin this threat down as soon as possible so we can bring things back to normal and stop depending on outside help!

If all our calculations are correct it looks like there’s an Alpha P.E.T. behind all of this, although we have no idea who created it. We may be wrong but it seems to suggest a more advanced technology than the VRU. Once it’s been eradicated things should settle down but we need to pinpoint it first and that’s where you come in!
Alpha Alert

I guess you’ll be happy to know that this Alpha seems to have been created by a cross company failure. Whilst we eradicated the virus before, a number of units were too deep in space to be affected. In turn they adapted and created the Alpha P.E.T.s which are now causing us so many problems.

So, it appears that the reason for the existence of these ‘Alpha’s’ is due to a failure of all the companies to clean up their mess after the previous infection. A group of P.E.T.s left isolated and allowed to adapt and reform into a more powerful force. I guess this is what we pay for constant improvement.

I know some of you have been asking but this P.E.T. problem doesn’t appear to be linked to other events, it just seems that when the eradication signal was sent out when this happened previously, it didn’t reach a bunch of P.E.T.s in deep space. Where they adapted and formed a new Alpha, based on all the companies' tech.
Other Agendas

I know how your MMO techs will view this but for the VRU we are delighted to have discovered a new protocol from the ashes of these events. One that will certainly enhance P.E.T.s in the future. So, your blunt actions have proven useful but, in reality, you are hardly the type of pilot we would be expecting to join the VRU.

We’re just waiting for the EIC to pompously announce that they found this first but rest assured the VRU are the ones who discovered the new protocol in the heart of all this madness. Seems that something good has come about from your actions, and I bet you can’t say that often when working for your normal bosses.

It appears that what harms us may also act as a boon. The rogue P.E.T.’s are showing higher Protocols which we can definitely utilize. If these events have proven one thing it’s that the VRU policy of constant adaptation is a powerful ally when creating new technology. But be reassured, your role here will not be ignored.
A New Protocol

Well, I can’t say it’s been nice but you’ve definitely done a job and so, if you destroy the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll reward you with a special treat. Let’s just call it something to remember us by. Now please remove all your greasy items from the pilots lounge and get the hell out of our region of space. I’m sure the MMO have their own problems!

Now that your tasks are nearly complete, just that Alpha P.E.T. to defeat, I’d say it’s time we advise you that you'll receive a special prize. Well, we know an imperialist like you won’t be happy but I’m sure if you do some work for the ‘glorious’ EIC and MMO as well you may get something better.

Now we’ve pinned the Alpha P.E.T. down it’s time to obliterate it and we’ve created a special treat for you, to celebrate your coming victory. So it’s time to go and face that beast so we can lose this business and start our independent operations up again. I’ve also heard if you aid the MMO and EIC you may be able to combine the P.E.T.’s together!
P.E.T End
This is an emergency beacon *STOP* Virus synthesizing in VRU systems *STOP* Need assistance *STOP* Objectives identified *STOP*
Alert! *STOP* VRU systems infected *STOP* Communications systems failing *STOP* Please assist. *STOP*

Pilot. Something seems to have synthesized itself in our systems; a virus we thought we’d eradicated. It seems that it’s affecting numerous programs throughout the VRU so be careful out there and make sure you eliminate any threat we identify. If we can contain this threat quickly, it shouldn’t blow out of proportion.
Battling the Virus

We’ve been given special clearance to speak to you. Whilst you may be on the grubbier end of the spectrum it appears this virus is affecting us all. Therefore, on this one occasion your organization has revoked the Warbond and is allowing you to work for us. Be warned, pilot, we are monitoring your actions. Keep your nose clean.

We’ve agreed with your imperialist masters that you can work for us on this occasion. Please note we will be monitoring our assets carefully and be warned, if we are not united in our response, the virus could adapt and spread into all ship systems, leaving us open to attack. Often we have to take a path that is less beaten.

The virus seems to be spreading further. The same one that affected the P.E.T.s in the past, which is strange as our science division said they’d eradicated it. Because of the special circumstances and the threat to all humanities defense systems we’re going to also call in MMO and EIC pilots and suspend the Warbond.
Special Clearance

Not as efficient as VRU pilots by any stretch of the imagination but you’ve done the job. Although I think some training in etiquette would help, as our hanger staff have been complaining about oil marks in the docking bays. This virus is similar to the P.E.T. virus, which we thought we’d eradicated. Perhaps the EIC released a sample.

Although we appreciate your help, please don’t have ideas above your station. Whilst we’re happy for you to share our information this does not mean you can broadcast EIC propaganda throughout our space, so make sure you calm that shit down. Seems this virus is the one that affected P.E.T.s previously. Thought we’d killed that one.

If we can’t pin down this virus soon there’s no end to the damage it can cause. Four of our officers Augmented Reality headsets went on the blink, meaning they ejected themselves from an airlock because they thought they were heading to the refectory. It’s essential we pin this virus down as soon as possible.
Spread Mechanics

We’ve tracked down the reason this viral strain is spreading but not where it stemmed from. Although we think there have been equal problems in your organization. Still, this does not stop the fact that we need to stop this thing, and you MMO people are used to getting your hands dirty, so best you get on with it.

We may have some information about the release of the virus, and believe me, the EIC are just as much to blame. However, we still haven’t uncovered the root of the infection. Which is something we’ll be tasking you all with as we move forward. However, suppression of the infection is the first thing on the cards.

As embarrassing as it is for us to admit, it appears that the virus spread in our systems because one of our staff thought it would be very post-modern to make their password, ‘password’! A person who has now been incarcerated for a considerable period of time. So we’ll take some responsibility for the virus’ spread.
Reactivating the Strain

We’ve had a theory and want to test something out. We’re not sure if this will affect anything on your ship but, let’s face facts, you MMO are always talking about how tough you are. Best be prepared all the same as your blunt tactics are proving useful. Once you have resolved your objectives come back to us.

Every time you respond to us, it’s like we’re hearing a voice from the past. You must try and stop the EIC imperialist rot and just respond like a normal human being. We have a test for you to complete, it may be dangerous but that’s what you people are all about, isn’t it? Get out there and complete the objectives and tell us the results.

Our scientists have managed to pin down a flaw in the viral makeup so we can test some counter measures. Creating some areas where P.E.T.s don’t work. We need you to check this region out to confirm that everything is going according to plan and then destroy another two of the rogue P.E.T.s so we can gather samples in isolation.
Counter Measures

Not bad, pilot. A little bit direct, but you Martians are all the same. Keeping things simple and leaving the proper science to people like the great VRU. However, the theory we were testing hasn’t worked as expected. The virus has rebuffed some of our attempts and so we need more samples to discover what is controlling this infection.

You certainly make your point, pilot. Not the way we’d do it, a little bit too much derring-do rather than efficient logical thinking. You got the job done and so it’s now become clear that something else is controlling the virus, as our anti-viral program is not taking full effect. Time to investigate further and gather more evidence.

So part of that worked, part didn’t. We’re much closer to reestablishing vital systems throughout the VRU now, using the tech we discovered to aid their protection. The issue is what is controlling these damn P.E.T.s. We sent out an anti-virus and it just seems to have hit a brick wall. Better get us some more evidence to analyze.
Controlling Factor

Seems there’s an ‘Alpha’ out there who is controlling all the others. Which has seemingly created a backdoor into the rogue P.E.T.s systems. Meaning the only way to stop this viral infection is to kill the alpha and then deploy the anti-virus again, before anything can adapt. You’ll need to work hard, but that’s the MMO doctrine, isn’t it?

We’ve uncovered the root of the problem and it appears that there’s an alpha P.E.T. out there somewhere, which is managing to operate a backdoor in the rogue P.E.T.s you’ve encountered. It’s important we pin this threat down as soon as possible so we can bring things back to normal and stop depending on outside help!

If all our calculations are correct it looks like there’s an Alpha P.E.T. behind all of this, although we have no idea who created it. We may be wrong but it seems to suggest a more advanced technology than the VRU. Once it’s been eradicated things should settle down but we need to pinpoint it first and that’s where you come in!
Alpha Alert

I guess you’ll be happy to know that this Alpha seems to have been created by a cross company failure. Whilst we eradicated the virus before, a number of units were too deep in space to be affected. In turn they adapted and created the Alpha P.E.T.s which are now causing us so many problems.

So, it appears that the reason for the existence of these ‘Alpha’s’ is due to a failure of all the companies to clean up their mess after the previous infection. A group of P.E.T.s left isolated and allowed to adapt and reform into a more powerful force. I guess this is what we pay for constant improvement.

I know some of you have been asking but this P.E.T. problem doesn’t appear to be linked to other events, it just seems that when the eradication signal was sent out when this happened previously, it didn’t reach a bunch of P.E.T.s in deep space. Where they adapted and formed a new Alpha, based on all the companies' tech.
Other Agendas

I know how your MMO techs will view this but for the VRU we are delighted to have discovered a new protocol from the ashes of these events. One that will certainly enhance P.E.T.s in the future. So, your blunt actions have proven useful but, in reality, you are hardly the type of pilot we would be expecting to join the VRU.

We’re just waiting for the EIC to pompously announce that they found this first but rest assured the VRU are the ones who discovered the new protocol in the heart of all this madness. Seems that something good has come about from your actions, and I bet you can’t say that often when working for your normal bosses.

It appears that what harms us may also act as a boon. The rogue P.E.T.’s are showing higher Protocols which we can definitely utilize. If these events have proven one thing it’s that the VRU policy of constant adaptation is a powerful ally when creating new technology. But be reassured, your role here will not be ignored.
A New Protocol

Well, I can’t say it’s been nice but you’ve definitely done a job and so, if you destroy the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll reward you with a special treat. Let’s just call it something to remember us by. Now please remove all your greasy items from the pilots lounge and get the hell out of our region of space. I’m sure the MMO have their own problems!

Now that your tasks are nearly complete, just that Alpha P.E.T. to defeat, I’d say it’s time we’d advise you that we have a prize we’ll give you. Well, we know an imperialist like you won’t be happy but I’m sure if you do some work for the ‘glorious’ EIC and MMO as well you may get something better.

Now we’ve pinned the Alpha P.E.T. down it’s time to obliterate it and we’ve created a special treat for you, to celebrate your coming victory. So it’s time to go and face that beast so we can lose this business and start our independent operations up again. I’ve also heard if you aid the MMO and EIC you may be able to combine the P.E.T.’s together!
P.E.T End

Citizen. It appears that we have had a viral outbreak, which is spreading quickly across our subsystems. Luckily, MMO technology is built with redundancies in mind, so we’ve managed to replace many of those systems to maintain a working operation. However, guess what, we need you to investigate!

Please stand by! Normal service will resume shortly. Your call is valuable to us! Please stand…. Can anyone out there hear me? Need help… failure… Computer virus spreading through… systems. Assist please!

Welcome to Mars Mining Operations. Your call is held in a queue and will be answered shortly! If you require further assistance… This is a General Distress Call. Help. We’ve got system wide failures. Can you assist us?
Outbreak

Much as we don’t appreciate the EIC and VRU it seems that this global problem will require us to work together to resolve this problem. Therefore, pilots of the other companies may also be helping resolve this. We need to be pragmatic about this process so we’d appreciate it if you concentrate on the rogue P.E.T.s.
Oh, thank god. So pleased… able to assist… Communications systems… failing. P.E.T.s appear… rogue. Giving… MMO clearance… assist.

Who’d have thought that you VRU tech-heads would be helping out the MMO. Still, as we say. ‘Union is Power’ so it seems we’re in the same boat. We’re not asking you to sign up with us but perhaps you can still assist in dealing with this rogue P.E.T. problem.
Clearance Given

This virus seems to be spreading. My wife told me that the auto-cook tried to chop her up this morning – although the company who made it are associated with the EIC, so no surprise. If things keep escalating even the robust MMO systems may be at threat. So, we need you to act quickly to solve things, my friend.
Issues… spreading. Vital you still… We could die… assistance. Please don’t abandon us. We revoke… Warbond in this situation… Work… solve problem. Continue to aid…

I hear you had some issues with the cleanliness of our facilities. Perhaps you’ve not seen a real days work in your life, where people actually act together, rather than merely adapt their surroundings. Still, for now the Warbond has been lifted and, despite better judgement, your help is ‘welcome’. So show us what you’ve got.
Escalation

Much as we like to keep things simple here in the MMO it doesn’t help when our citizens take that too literally. The virus appears to have spread from an unknown source that one of our staff opened. Apparently, a prince who needed his family’s riches protected. Clearly false. By identifying the source, we can hopefully find a cure.

Communications systems… stabilizing. Failure… security. Thanks for your help, comrade. There’s still much to do but if you can consider working for us further we’ll make sure you are rewarded. Although we have issues with the EIC, you seem to understand our values in the MMO. Now please complete the tasks we have set.

It appears the virus was released into our systems by a failure on each company’s part. Yes, even your precious VRU, technical wizards that you are, have added to this problem. Let it be known that the MMO take responsibility for our issues. Rewarding you for any actions you undertake. Just show us what you can do.
The Curse of Security

Citizen. We’ve managed to pin down the issues and generally clear MMO systems of immediate threats. I can’t say the other two companies have acted as quickly, but we still have a problem to deal with and so cannot take advantage of the situation. We need to test our findings. Please get out there and do your job!

Seems that MMO command have utilized a fix, which has brought most of our systems back online. The rogue P.E.T.’s are still a problem though. Your assistance is still worthwhile and almost valued. Let me clarify. Your imperialist leaders still subjugate their workers but perhaps you can see the benefits of working with the MMO?

Were in the process of administering a galaxy wide fix. Well before the VRU have made one of their own, I might add. It seems that the fix still hasn’t impacted on the rogue P.E.T.s out there so we still need your assistance in helping eradicate this problem, once and for all. I hope you’re ready to do a proper days work?
Taking Advantage

The information you gathered is useful, citizen, but we’re still unclear what is controlling these rogue P.E.T.s. As the tests we performed based on the valuable evidence you gathered, did not manage to stop these devices. It’s almost as if there is something else out there controlling their very nature. Can you do some more investigating for us?

Well, seems the virus had a more complex structure than we thought. Potentially linked to the viral outbreak of the past. Although who can say how that managed to recur, as we thought it had been eradicated. Until we have identified the source of things, we need you to keep assisting the MMO. So please follow the mission instructions.

When things bubble up from the past it really annoys us. The MMO appreciate simple systems we all can understand, equality in the workforce and a true future for mankind. It appears that the viral outbreak of the past, where P.E.T.s went rogue is equally responsible for this outbreak. Even your help is valuable in bringing about a resolution.
Puppet Master

Seems we might have a main P.E.T. out there who keeps rewriting the others protocols, ensuring we can’t control them. Whatever the method, it simply appears that these P.E.T.s need to be destroyed. Nothing else will resolve the issue now and if we can’t stop the source, we’ll never stop the infection. Please act in our best interests, citizen.

All the evidence is pointing to something else rewriting the code of the rogue P.E.T.s as everything the MMO throws at them is overridden. When it was first formed the EIC created this type of back-door, in order to control their people. Not that we’re blaming you, pilot, you’re just a pawn in their plans. Better to help us with ours.

With the evidence you’ve gathered and with a bit of co-ordination with the other companies, which the MMO arranged of course, we can see that there appears to be another, more powerful, P.E.T. out there. We’re hoping you can keep your agenda clear to help us finally solve these problems and will honor our agreements if you finish the job.
Top of the Tree

It appears that this problem is of our own making. Whilst others have recently raised their heads, like the Ministry, as well as the continued elimination of our facilities on the Rim, it appears this is down to us. We should have cleaned out the deepest regions of space, where these P.E.T.s have been slowly adapting themselves. We will learn from our errors.

The MMO are sure a companywide issue throughout the known galaxy created these events. So we’re all to blame but whilst the EIC blusters about and the VRU seem to fail to acknowledge their part of this the MMO have taken action. We still need you to prove you’re better than the rest of your organization so please continue.

I know you’re proud of the genetic spread of the VRU but let me be clear to you. It’s the MMO who started negotiations to finally end this issue and it will be the MMO who people trust in the future. We’re willing to admit our hand in this problem, as it appears P.E.T.s were missed during the last outbreak. Please resolve this.
Of Our Own Making

Citizen. The earlier reports about unusual protocols have made us analyze the data we gathered and realize that a new Protocol for the P.E.T.s is possible. We’re delighted to share this news for you and have also been developing a special reward for you, once this crisis is over. You’re almost there, comrade. You’re almost there.

It seems what we’re learning from our research is that new protocols may be available. Ones that we’ll be ensuring aid the MMO pilots as they reach further towards the stars in order to spread our word of unity. I know you’re sad your imperialist company cannot say the same. Nevertheless, we’re planning a great reward when all is done.

The techs at MMO HQ have defined a new level of protocol from the evidence you and our pilots gathered. Clearly, the MMO gathered more of the vital evidence. Which means potential enhancements to P.E.T.’s. Helping us spread the word of our efficiency further. Time to complete the last couple of jobs for us, before you go.
Practical Results

The final mission we have for you will pit you against this rogue Alpha P.E.T. To commemorate your victory we’ve managed to develop something special for you. One that, when integrated with the rewards that the EIC and VRU are providing, might just be equally rewarding. Just remember that the tech at the heart is still MMO!

Before we re-establish the Warbond it is important to recognize your services to the MMO. So once you’ve taken out the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll give you something special, to commemorate your time with us. We know in the future you’ll realize we’re the better organization. Now head out and destroy the final threat.

We have to grudgingly admit that you’ve been helpful. Although your sense of etiquette is far too overdeveloped for the workings of our trueborn people. However it is good to show you the other and better way of doing things and before the Warbond is established we’d like to thank you for your help. Now tidy up this last thing.
Battle for Control

Citizen. It appears that we have had a viral outbreak, which is spreading quickly across our subsystems. Luckily, MMO technology is built with redundancies in mind, so we’ve managed to replace many of those systems to maintain a working operation. However, guess what, we need you to investigate!

Please stand by! Normal service will resume shortly. Your call is valuable to us! Please stand…. Can anyone out there hear me? Need help… failure… Computer virus spreading through… systems. Assist please!

Welcome to Mars Mining Operations. Your call is held in a queue and will be answered shortly! If you require further assistance… This is a General Distress Call. Help. We’ve got system wide failures. Can you assist us?
Outbreak

Please get out there and do your job!

I hope you’re ready to do a proper days work?

We’re delighted to share this news for you and have also been developing a special reward for you, once this crisis is over. You’re almost there, comrade. You’re almost there.

Ones that we’ll be ensuring aid the MMO pilots as they reach further towards the stars in order to spread our word of unity. I know you’re sad your imperialist company cannot say the same. Practical Results

The final mission we have for you will pit you against this rogue Alpha P.E.T. To commemorate your victory we’ve managed to develop something special for you. One that, when integrated with the rewards that the EIC and VRU are providing, produces an equally good reward. Just remember that the tech at the heart is still MMO!

Before we re-establish the Warbond it is important to recognize your services to the MMO. So once you’ve taken out the Alpha P.E.T. we’ll give you something special, to commemorate your time with us. We know in the future you’ll realize we’re the better organization. Now head out and destroy the final threat.

We have to grudgingly admit that you’ve been helpful. Although your sense of etiquette is far too overdeveloped for the workings of our trueborn people. However it is good to show you the other and better way of doing things and before the Warbond is established we’d like to thank you for your help. Now tidy up this last thing.
Battle for Control

Good Day. This is a General Distress Call from Earth Industries Corporation. It appears we’re having a spot of bother with a few of our machines. If someone out there could help us out that would be wonderful. No need to rush… Well to be honest if you could rush a little that would be awfully helpful.

Pilots of the EIC. We need to inform you of some technical problems we’ve discovered in the last few days which seem to be spreading through our systems. I think we’ve been hacked. It appears that some of our technology has gone haywire so it would be great if you could get out there and help. This is not a request!

Hey there pilots. Something has gone wrong with my mum’s communications array. Which means I can broadcast into VRU territory from EIC military comms. What a rush! I just wanted to say that we all think you in the VRU stink! But mum is asking if you can help us out anyway, as the washing machine appears to be on the blink!
Empirical Data

Smashing job there, pilot. I always thought that you MMO people were a little bit backwards but it seems you know how to complete a mission. I’d just like to explain that I’m not officially speaking on behalf of the EIC, but I’m sure, given the circumstances, that we can ask for more of your aid. “Bound for Victory”, as we say! You ready?

Captain, I’m releasing you from the Warbond for now. It appears this virus has affected all the EIC communications and all and sundry are broadcasting out and seeking aid. Some of the other main companies have come to their aid too. There’s a lot going on at the moment and as we try and get control back, we have another mission for you.

It’s so cool I’m telling you what to do. While the image on your communication screen is still the high commander. So now pilot, you’re working for me and will follow my instructions! Oops, sorry of that sounded all official, it’s my first time doing this. You can call me Billy if that helps. I seem to be getting emergency signals, can you help them out?
War of Words

Well done you! It appears you managed to smash those blighters to smithereens. You MMO people are quite blunt when dealing with this stuff. It also appears that P.E.T.s seem to be infected as well. Heard that they’re going rogue all across space. Hope you’re the person to deal with this while I mix myself an itty bitty cocktail.

Believe me pilot, however bad you think things are at your end, they’re a million-and-one times worse here. We’ve got all types of idiots flooding our feed, yet luckily they seem to be directing pilots from the other factions. This problem seems to be spreading and so we need to get on top of things now, before they really go out of control.

Even for smelly old VRU you seem a little cool. But, don’t let my dad catch my dad saying that. I just keep getting all these distress signals about P.E.T.s here on my panel and am forwarding them to you and the other pilots out there. I reckon I could do this as a job. Let me try my important voice again. ‘Your company needs you. Act now!’
P.E.T. Problems

Shame you’re not here to share a drink. I do seem to be all alone with this communication feed and the bar, which I accidently was locked into. Still, I see myself as looking after the place, so I guess the owner owes me a few drinks. Something here says a young Boy called Billy released the virus. Guess he’ll be in trouble, like we’ll be without your help!

The virus seems to have been sitting dormant in an application which need a special code to trigger it, and one child in the EIC seems to have managed to unlock that code. This simply is not my day, I’m going to have to cancel my dinner plans. Although there seem to be leaks in MMO and VRU territories too. Please try to stem the problems.

So, I was playing this game, and then I saw this hack sheet online and decided to try it out so I could top the leaderboards. So awesome being inside the code and found this thing called a ‘Doomsday Code’, so I triggered it. After that, the communications started redirecting themselves. How awesome was that?
Released into the Wild

Well, that dry martini went down awfully well and I’ve found a book on how to make other cocktails. So I’m about to have a fabulous time. What’s that you say. Next objective. Well, my next objective is to get outrageously… Oh! Your next objective! Why didn’t you say? I’ve sent it to your mission objectives panel. Looks like a lot of fun.

The boffins have come up with a plan, which might disrupt the P.E.T.s, as they seem to be the main source of the infection. If you can follow the instructions in the mission objectives, we can hopefully quell this and stop it turning into a disaster. Luckily, it’s affecting all the companies so there’s no chance of a pre-emptive strike.

Mum is telling me I need to go to bed soon. I think that stinks and I told her that I was doing vital stuff for the EIC. Not sure she believed me, she also said she has had some messages from EIC Command asking about my name. Like I started this whole problem, duh! Anyway, you have a mission to do, get to it.
Close Down

The screen is a little blurred, but I think it says here that your last mission was an unmitigated success. Congratulations, you! Unfortunately, even though you were successful it appears the problems are still ongoing. This is thirsty work. Wonder who’s controlling those P.E.T.s. Sounds like a job for my favorite pilot, eh!

The data you gathered there was invaluable. It definitely proves that there’s another source, which is overwriting the antiviral code we created. One that seems to be coming from deep space. We’re starting to get the communication streams back in control now, which means we’ll be able to triangulate our methods better. Get back out there!

No, mum, no! I need to tell the VRU pilot what to do next. I know it’s past my bedtime but pleeaassee. You always said I had a lot of potential, so look. I’m using my potential now. Pilot, I think there’s another source of the virus out there you need to suppress. Mum tells me I’ve got to get ready for bed now.
Out of Control

So, we’re the best team, aren’t we. You doing the action out there and me monitoring you from this lovely bar, with all its lovely drinks. This one is green, it looks just like a big, big… erm… green thing. Now, on the special screen it says there may be an Alpha P.E.T. What’s one of those then? I wonder if it’s in my cocktail book?

Everything is pointing to a rogue Alpha P.E.T. out there. Although we’ll need to pin down its location and we can only do this with your dedicated aid. We’re planning a special reward for you when this is all over, pilot. The team in the labs have become quite excited about what you might have discovered. More later. Act now!

This is Billy’s mum. I’m not sure what he’s told you but he’s been a very, very, very naughty boy. If he’s responsible for all of this then I don’t know what his dad is going to say. It also tells me you’re a VRU pilot, I’m not sure I should even be talking to you. Sorry? The next mission! Well press accept and get on with it then.
Top Dog

I think I’m a little bit tipsy. It’s like every bottle has a myriad of glowing stars which are making me a little dizzy and… Sorry, just fell off my chair. I’d say that this whole thing is our own fault. We create new things and then they come and attack us. It’s like the movies, we’re all going to die. Sorry, sorry, I’ll compose myself a little better next time!

Given the effects of this virus have affected most of humanity I don’t think they relate to anything but the precious time the P.E.T’s went wild. This just shows what happens when you don’t clean up properly. Although the weight of the blame obviously lands in the MMO and VRU’s hands. A few more missions and we’ll be clear.

No, no! I’m still here. Apparently your transmission is just coming straight back to Billy’s computer now. I’ve been told to keep feeding you information… just let me read this… ‘Even though you are a mortal enemy!’ Did you follow that? It says there are a few missions to complete still. Here’s the next one.
None of Your Concern

Whatcha sayin’? Do I even know you… or trust you. Well, you have a nice voice and I really, really like nice voices. Like nectar on a rainy day. Tee he! Think they’re going to take back control from me now. But, sshhhh! I didn’t tell you but I think they’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol. Whatever that is it sounds neat! Hic!

Really glad this is coming to an end, pilot. With the failure in communications systems and a selection of other problems, we seem to be finally getting control of this thing. The other companies have even done their minor parts. Surprising I know! That think we discovered in the lab. Seems we’ve uncovered a new P.E.T. protocol!

The EIC say they’re going to be taking back control of communications in the next few minutes, so I’ll say goodbye now, before you go. I quite enjoyed telling you what to do for a while, seems better than my job as a manager of a space haulage firm. There’s talk here of a new P.E.T. protocol. Good luck on your travels!
Laboratory Analysis

This is EIC Command. We’ve regained control of this communications channel and would like to assure you that the person you were speaking to was not representative of our office. We appreciate your help at this difficult time and would like to reward you for your actions. Please destroy the rogue Alpha P.E.T. to receive this reward!

Finally, we have control of all our communications channels again. Thanks for your patience and help, pilot. You’ve done the EIC proud in this difficult time. It’s hard to put a value on what you’ve done but our accounting division have done just that, and we’ve a special reward for you if you just kill that damn rogue Alpha P.E.T.

Greetings, pilot. We have to thank you for your assistance at this trying time and apologize for the junior spaceman who seems to have been ordering you about. It is not our policy to allow communications to fail, but I think you’re aware of the circumstances. If you destroy that Alpha P.E.T. then we’ll reward you well.
Final Call

Good Day. This is a General Distress Call from Earth Industries Corporation. It appears we’re having a spot of bother with a few of our machines. If someone out there could help us out that would be wonderful. No need to rush… Well to be honest if you could rush a little that would be awfully helpful.

Pilots of the EIC. We need to inform you of some technical problems we’ve discovered in the last few days which seem to be spreading through our systems. I think we’ve been hacked. It appears that some of our technology has gone haywire so it would be great if you could get out there and help. This is not a request!

Hey there pilots. Something has gone wrong with my mum’s communications array. Which means I can broadcast into VRU territory from EIC military comms. What a rush! I just wanted to say that we all think you in the VRU stink! But mum is asking if you can help us out anyway, as the washing machine appears to be on the blink!
Empirical Data

Smashing job there, pilot. I always thought that you MMO people were a little bit backwards but it seems you know how to complete a mission. I’d just like to explain that I’m not officially speaking on behalf of the EIC, but I’m sure, given the circumstances, that we can ask for more of your aid. “Bound for Victory”, as we say! You ready?

Captain, I’m releasing you from the Warbond for now. It appears this virus has affected all the EIC communications and all and sundry are broadcasting out and seeking aid. Some of the other main companies have come to their aid too. There’s a lot going on at the moment and as we try and get control back, we have another mission for you.

It’s so cool I’m telling you what to do. While the image on your communication screen is still the high commander. So now pilot, you’re working for me and will follow my instructions! Oops, sorry of that sounded all official, it’s my first time doing this. You can call me Billy if that helps. I seem to be getting emergency signals, can you help them out?
War of Words

Well done you! It appears you managed to smash those blighters to smithereens. You MMO people are quite blunt when dealing with this stuff. It also appears that P.E.T.s seem to be infected as well. Heard that they’re going rogue all across space. Hope you’re the person to deal with this while I mix myself an itty bitty cocktail.

Believe me pilot, however bad you think things are at your end, they’re a million-and-one times worse here. We’ve got all types of idiots flooding our feed, yet luckily they seem to be directing pilots from the other factions. This problem seems to be spreading and so we need to get on top of things now, before they really go out of control.

Even for smelly old VRU you seem a little cool. But, don’t let my dad catch my dad saying that. I just keep getting all these distress signals about P.E.T.s here on my panel and am forwarding them to you and the other pilots out there. I reckon I could do this as a job. Let me try my important voice again. ‘Your company needs you. Act now!’
P.E.T. Problems

Shame you’re not here to share a drink. I do seem to be all alone with this communication feed and the bar, which I accidently was locked into. Still, I see myself as looking after the place, so I guess the owner owes me a few drinks. Something here says a young Boy called Billy released the virus. Guess he’ll be in trouble, like we’ll be without your help!

Final Call

Струва ми се, че отдавна не сме си говорили с теб, пилоте! Чудех се дали не ме отбягваш и не си намерил други приятели? Все пак, няма за какво да се тревожим, вече си тук и можем да работим заедно срещу извънземната заплаха. И така, докато ти ги отвяваш и получаваш награди, аз ще изпратя няколко от моите слуги да изследват района за технологически напредък! Разбрахме ли се?
Грабване на технологии

Тревожа се за другите хора, с които работиш напоследък. Можеш да придобиеш цял куп лоши обноски покрай тях. Далеч по-добре е да продължиш да работиш за своите приятели като Никс и, разбира се, за мен. Нека влиянието на другите не се разпространява. Ние ще те пазим, запомни това!
Разширяване на влиянието

Играем опасна игра - като бягане с ножове в тъмното. Отблъскваме извънземните, но все повече продължават да се изсипват в нашия район. Опасявам се, че нещо не е наред в техните светове, защото предпочитат да се бият във военна зона срещу човечеството и едни срещу други. Нещо се променя и то не е за добро!
Бягане с ножове

Справи се страхотно, пилоте! Предизвика извънземните и им даде да разберат. Знам, обаче, че някои от вас искат да покажат, че са в най-добрата си форма. Затова те моля да помогнеш в осигуряването на мира в нашите космически райони, за да може търговските и пътническите кораби да преминават необезпокоявани.
Краля на хълма

Струва ми се, че отдавна не сме си говорили с теб, пилоте! Чудех се дали не ме отбягваш и не си намерил други приятели? Все пак, няма за какво да се тревожим, вече си тук и можем да работим заедно срещу извънземната заплаха. И така, докато ти ги отвяваш и получаваш награди, аз ще изпратя няколко от моите слуги да изследват района за технологически напредък! Разбрахме ли се?

Negative honor points
Restore your reputation.
Shoot down enemies at will until your honor is no longer in the red.
This is a task for fast pilots willing to risk their neck: A race on the most dangerous star chart in outer space.

We need reliable data about the resistance of our shields. But every time we offer this task to test pilots, they thankfully decline. Are you bold enough to go where no man has gone before - the radiation zone?
Bets are being taken in the ship's mess hall. Who can destroy the most Streuners in 60 seconds? Power up your lasers and give them a piece of your mind.
This task is very demanding: Go on a journey to an enemy map.
Greetings Space Pilot, I just received a special request: I'm passing it on to you without saying a word.
We're having more and more problems contending with enemy attacks on our home map. Set an example and use your tactical advantage to start a counterstrike.
We're having more and more problems contending with enemy attacks on our home map. Set an example and use your tactical advantage to start a counterstrike.
We're having more and more problems contending with enemy attacks on our home map. Set an example and use your tactical advantage to start a counterstrike.
We're having more and more problems contending with enemy attacks on our home map. Set an example and use your tactical advantage to start a counterstrike.
A task from our research labs: We need more info on the rare Cubikon race.
Is it your life-long dream to travel through space? If so, this mission will see that your dreams come true.
This mission will require you to make important decisions. Follow your own path in this assignment. Are you a hunter or a gatherer?
It's going to take a specialist to get this job done. They'll have to cause some major damage in no time at all.
More resources are needed for the research labs. Set a course for space and get us everything we need.
A hefty battle awaits you. If you're already having second thoughts, then don't even try.

The perfect task for all bounty hunters out there. Just recently, a few of our pilots were blown to spacedust by the Kristallonians. Engage your engines and shoot down anything that sparkles in the sun.
An urgent task! Activate warp and collect Endurium. Don't get killed in the process, pilot!
Those Kristallonians just can't get enough: Hunt them down and blow them to pieces.
You're the perfect pilot for this task. Clean up space so that our company can continue its course of expansion.
I know, it might be a pesky task, but somebody's got to do it. Don't worry: It's dead easy.
One more task for our new pilot recruits: Investigate the galaxies on your own home map.
Play it safe? Or walk on the wild side? It's your choice. Pick a task which suits you best.
A little birdie told me that you were lightning-quick at collecting resources. Or am I mistaken? It doesn't matter anyway. Here's another task for you to complete.

A mission from our archives: Read your orders below.

Welcome to DarkOrbit Mission Control. I'm your corporate liaison, and starting immediately I'll be providing you with new jobs (missions). The different jobs available can be found in the list on the left. Click the accept button on the bottom right to start a mission. You can carry out a maximum of 3 missions at once. After that you'll either need to complete or cancel a mission in order to accept a new one. After completing a job, it will be put on display in "Challenges". This is where the mission will be evaluated, and in the case of a contest, be compared to other players. In other words, you can show off your skills here!

Our company needs another large shipment of resources. Don't bother with those small rocks floating around in space. Steal the valuable stuff from alien ships.
I'm slipping you a top secret mission. We need you to steal something for us from our enemies. We'll look the other way this time!
This task is like taking candy from a baby. Well ... a big baby, maybe.
A top secret task: Retrieve valuable goods for us from enemy companies.
A scout reported that there's a strange wormhole on the 4-5 map. Search out this wormhole and find out what it's all about. I don't expect you to return, but if you do, report back to me.
A crazy task for wild pilots just like you. You're not afraid of Goliaths, right? No? Then try this mission on for size.
Our company's vacation committee has relocated you to a new vacation spot this year - a really special location on the enemy X-1 maps.
To make it among into the upper echelons of space pilots, you've got to know your way around our galaxy.
Do the enemy bases look just like ours?

The Department of Strategic Intiatives has come up with the brilliant plan to try out a new tactic: peaceful resistance. We don't have much say in the matter. Looks like we're just going to have to grin and bear it.
Eight minutes can be a very long time. Expose your ship to the most ultimate challenge.
Alien jellyfish are nasty creatures. It's up to you which ones you want to destroy. Just make sure to do it soon!
Tour around the higher level maps and pay a visit to the native aliens there.
Our rookie space pilots need all the help they can get. Take the noobs by the hand and remember to let them enjoy the glory.
An experienced pilot has to know how to perform under pressure - even with a half-destroyed ship. Survive this mission and become a hotshot pilot.
Don't let this wormhole frighten the living daylights out of you anymore. Suck it up and make the jump!
Don't let this wormhole frighten the living daylights out of you anymore. Suck it up and make the jump!
Enemy invasions are making it tricky for us to get new ammo supplies. Can you survive without your laser?
Enemy invasions are making it tricky for us to get new ammo supplies. Can you survive without your laser?
With an ammo shortage, the only way for us to overpower our enemies and keep our losses low is to make surprise attacks.
One more task for our new pilot recruits: Investigate the galaxies on your own home map.
One more task for our new pilot recruits: Investigate the galaxies on your own home map.
Tour around the higher level maps and pay a visit to the native aliens there.
Tour around the higher level maps and pay a visit to the native aliens there.
I've got a little test for you. There are a lot of people who think you can't pull it off, but I believe in you! Study the coordinates and show'em all that you can navigate through space.
I've got a little test for you. There are a lot of people who think you can't pull it off, but I believe in you! Study the coordinates and show'em all that you can navigate through space.
I've got a little test for you. There are a lot of people who think you can't pull it off, but I believe in you! Study the coordinates and show them all that you can navigate through space.
It doesn't always have to be hard. This mission is meant to introduce you to the far reaches of the universe. You are to collect resources and shoot down any Streuners who come within firing range.
Once you've taught the Streuners a lesson in fear, move onto the Lordakia. You've got exactly one minute!
The "one-minute Streuner" for pros: Protegites aren't easy to track down; set your lasers to fire for 5 minutes.

The UBA Ship Expo

Welcome to the UBA Ship Expo, brought to you by the galaxy's finest shipbuilders! I'll be your Company-sanctioned liaison and sales rep for the duration; I've been authorized to dispense all your mission rewards while you enjoy our Expo. My name is Baobabeli Rygus. Please, call me Bob. It's a real pleasure!
Business Trip

Don't worry about your usual assignments and missions: as you can see, they won't be interrupted! You can get them done in between visiting the booths - after all, pilots are SO hot right now, right? Must be nice to be so envied. No little kids ever dream of being a used ship salesman, ha ha!
Tempting Prizes

Looks like it's not just you elite pilot squads who want to visit the best Expo in the history of ships! Pirates have been nibbling at our security cordon since we started setting up. I think the sight of all those sleek, shiny new ships is just too much for them to resist!
Pop Culture Heroes

Have you seen that giant ad in the lobby? That hotshot in the Scorpions, Estella St Aubyn, got herself a sweet deal with that cereal endorsement and no mistake, right? You'll see it on the way out - and don't forget, there's a talk by the Chief Engineer of Kepler Foundries later today that you won't want to miss!
Yamato

Hey now, have you heard about the re-issue of the Yamato? Used to be a really trim little ship - ended up being mothballed not too many years ago, when there was that nasty business with the iceberg invasion thing. I'll be honest, I don't keep up with the news much, so I don't really remember the details.
Old-Timer Re-issues

It's not just the Yamato, you know - the Defcon has also been re-issued! Both designs have been updated. They're great little ships, no longer obsolete, and will you just look at those lines! You don't get designs like that any more. Are you a bit of a classic ship enthusiast, too?
Expo Exploration

Have you seen the fins on that racing starjet two hangars over? No? Oh, come on, then - come with me, you've got to give this little beauty the once-over! I know - I understand; you're not in the market just now. But just take a quick look! You won't regret it, I promise.
Presentations

There's a panel later this afternoon that you might want to catch: "Shards in the Exhaust Ports: post-Kristallon encounter ship repair for sport hunters." No? I suppose there's not much anyone could teach you pilots about that sort of thing, right? Ha ha!
Prototypical

How are you liking our Expo so far? Oh, good! Now, please excuse me for a little while: there's a prototype model being unveiled in Hall C in a few minutes, and I just have to see it. Luna Industries and Titan Tech have been in a bit of an arms race trying to develop a new kind of battlecruiser...
Cutting Edge

The prototype was all right, but really, it's the new Titan Technologies cruise control that's going to dominate the next few years, if you ask me. Responsive, defensive, intelligent automatic flying that lets pilots concentrate on their weapons? Amazing stuff.
New Money

Did you see his entourage? Ha ha! Yeah, there are a bunch of them at the Expo - petty lords of their little outposts, on asteroids and planets no-one's ever heard of. No taste, no class, no know-how, no ingenuity - all they got is money, so we're here to help 'em spend it, right?
New Clients

Say, maybe you could help me out with something. You see, my bosses in the Expo Steering Committee have been chasing these backwater billionaires' Credits for months, but it's like herding cats. They've finally caught their interest by promising a big alien hunt in our newest ships.
Big Fish On the Line

I was hoping you'd help me out. See, my bosses want to stage a demonstration first, in a normal ship - show these billionaires what a really good pilot can do with existing hardware, and shoot down a lot of flashy aliens. Kristallons, say. You can handle those, right?
Ghost Flying

Our nano-cams captured it all - you were very impressive! The billionaires have agreed to try out our state-of-the-art models... Um, but a lot of them come from rough outposts with a go-big-or-go-home mentality, right? So, well, they've got their sights set on some pretty big game. They want to go after Cubicons. And, um, Battlerays. If you could help them out, there's no need for them to know it wasn't exactly all their laser fire that brought down the big guys, right?
The Eighth Wonder of the World

A moment! Before you set off on your next adventure, I have something to say - no, I'm not retiring, don't worry. Our new Assembly is ready! It displays the finest and newest in high technology, but it's short some raw materials. If you see Saimon around, see if you can ...convince them to donate some of their scrap.
Powering Up

That private tour of the new Assembly was eye-opening. You should see it! 3D printers, nanoelectronics, high-precision lasers, a molecular foundry... but assembling items consumes vast amounts of energy. Plasmide will solve that for us - harass Devolariums for long enough and you'll be drowning in the stuff!
Venomous Organics

My brand-new Venom is a real eye-catcher, isn't she? Thanks to Mucosum, her drive generators are purring like kittens. Keep your nose to the grindstone and maybe you, too, will be able to produce a custom Venom in your Assembly, to show off in your Hangar!
Left in Shards

Prismatium is the hot new collectible commodity that everyone wants to get their hands on - and we're no exception! It allows the assembly of new laser cannons with some real oomph behind them. It's not easy to obtain, though: the Kristallon and Kristallin so rarely surrender their casings. Good luck!
Opportunity Makes a Thief

Honestly, the minute you turn your back, the Sibelon send all their cannon fodder subjects out to steal away all the collectibles we use in our Assemblies! Our need is much more urgent than theirs... if you can't convince those snotty Sibelons of that, I suggest applying rockets to the problem until it goes away.
UBA Grand Prize

Good work! After all this excitement, I was going to have you over for a quiet drink, but then the UBA served up an irresistible challenge. Pull off 50 victories in its hallowed arena, and you won't be able to move for being buried in collectibles! It's an opportunity we can't afford to ignore.
Assembly Ahoy!

Your cargo space is chock-a-block, eh? The hangar's foreman told me about it, the old gossip. Look here, with that much raw material, there's only one sensible course of action: visit the Assembly, and produce something magnificent! Or just something useful. What else is it for, after all?
Anomaly of Horror (easy)

Crrrr… crrrrr… -llo? Can you hear me? It’s me, the world-renowned Dr. Confusius. I need a brave pilot to examine the anomalies in this sector of space and I’ve chosen you to complete this immensely important task. Of course I’ve already told your Commander about it – trust me!
The Dogs of War (easy)

The data you collected is very revealing. Looks like we’re dealing with an EMP field that is scrambling P.E.T.s’ electron brains. It appears the disturbance is driving them mad, causing them to attack anything that moves. I’d like to take a closer look at one of these P.E.T.s. Think you can get one for me?
The Puppet Master (easy)

There’s nothing like good, old-fashioned dissection to get to the bottom of things. Cut open the chassis with a blowtorch so I can have a look at its innards. What did I find? Extremely complicated stuff, naturally. Someone is using the EMP field to control the P.E.T.s. The only question is who?
Cry of the P.E.T.s (easy)

Here we have the electron brain of a wild P.E.T. Look how it pulses – isn’t it mesmerizing? Are you not feeling well? You’re looking a bit pale. At any rate, I almost regret asking you to destroy them, given how cute they are. But they pose a threat to us all, so they must be exterminated.
The Pack (easy)

By the flask of Erlenmeyer! I saw it with my own two eyes! Rabid P.E.T.s, with an alpha leading the pack! The leader is sending impulses identical to those coming from the EMP field. I never should have implanted a Cubikon chip in the prototype. Stay put, pilot – I’m definitely going to need your help!
For the Good of Mankind (easy)

Alright, so I lied. I made the alpha. I wanted to develop a model with sentience, so it could adapt to its environment. I thought it would take lead, creating order for the P.E.T.s – I did it for the good of mankind! But then the prototype escaped and… what? Don’t look at me like that! These things happen in science.
Frankenstein‘s Legacy (easy)

I was having a look at your data… oh, sor-ry! I didn’t think you’d mind. Anyway, look at this – here’s where the alpha’s been hanging out. You don’t know the pain of destroying something you created – I mean, it’s practically my baby. Forget it, you wouldn’t understand. It has to be done, otherwise it’ll transform more perfectly loyal P.E.T.s into a pack of wild, unruly dogs! For the safety of mankind!
The Awakening (easy)

Bravo! You destroyed the alpha and the wild P.E.T.s are… still wild? What? How is this possible? The pack should have scattered without an alpha. Instead, they are gaining sentience and naming themselves. Do you know what this means? They’re learning and I MADE THEM! Ahem, sorry. They must be destroyed, of course.
Dr. Confusius’s Asteroid (easy)

Wild P.E.T.s are terribly vindictive, but not to worry – they’ll never get past my armored asteroids. All I have to do is press one little red button and KABOOM! It’s funny, they called me crazy when I developed these asteroids. Me, crazy? I’ll show them who’s crazy! Follow me.
Revenge of the Killer P.E.T.s (easy)

Fascinating… not you, my P.E.T.s. My babies. They’re looking for new allies. I can’t tell you how safe I feel in this asteroid, with you as my personal shield… err, bodyguard. And should you ever think of double-crossing me, remember all the treasures you’d have to kiss goodbye!
Heads Will Roll (easy)

The thought of those disgusting Saimon getting their filthy claws on my P.E.T.s makes me want to set everything on fire! It cannot happen, do you hear me? I can see it now – using my P.E.T. technology to burn them to a crisp. Brilliant, Confusius! I mean… see to it you bring me a few Saimon heads, will you?
Harbingers of Death (easy)

For the love of Boyle! The Devolarium found out about my asteroid and now there’s a whole mob of them just outside my front door, with a pack of rabid P.E.T.s nipping at their heels. What did I ever do to them? No, you can‘t leave now! If you stay and help, I’ll make it worth your while, I promise.
Asteroid of Darkness (easy)

Where there are Devolarium, the Sibelon are not far away? What is a Sibelon anyway? Stop rolling your eyes at me! I’m too busy and too important to be worrying myself with alien races. There’s a fast and easy way to take care of them, anyway. Fire up the old laser canon and… ZAP! Oh, woops…
Pathological Megalomania (easy)

I cannot thank you enough! You saved my life and, thus, modern science, as well. And, don’t worry – I’ve learned my lesson. I’ll never do an experiment so dangerous ever again. Haha, you don’t buy that, do you? I’m just getting warmed up! And I’m not going to stop until the entire universe is mine. ALL MINE! MUHAHAHA!
Anomaly of Horror (difficult)
