It's not your fault: you're still enmeshed in a corrupt system, built on lies... Perhaps one day we'll throw off the yoke of all three Companies, and reveal our true potential!

As for what's next, your cooperation may not have been voluntary, but I'm starting to see why the Helix foresees great things in your future. We'll be keeping an eye on you!
The Den

Streuners with technical upgrades? How did they come by those? This is highly suspicious. But for now, my scouts have found them - the ex-human scum think they're safely hidden in the Kuiper Belt. Let's unearth them from their burrows, just as hunters used to do to the fierce and wily koala of legend!
TODO
TODO
A Wild Streuner Appears!

Dry hells, what is it now? Damn Streuners - can't an old pirate water his plants in peace without something new coming up? I know I promised you a little rest, but something about these Streuners is different from what we've seen before. And that makes me antsy!

Tsk - it's a damning testament to our troubled times when an old officer cannot find a moment of peace to enjoy his coin collection. I'm aware I promised you some vacation time, but the Streuners are restless - and they're acting rather out of character. I need you to investigate.

Oh, honestly, why must something attack whenever I want to do the slightest little thing for myself? I can't so much as take a nice relaxing bath in peace! I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to refuse your request for leave. Streuners with unusual new upgrades are stirring up trouble, you see.
Streuner Metamorphosis

What? Streuners behaving un-Streunerly? Bah! I'm going to need you to look into containing this problem while we continue the search for Roque. My gut tells me that we're only just scraping the surface, here, so I want my best people on it. That means you!

What are you telling me - that the Streuner ships have received some sort of upgrade? New equipment? Great Gould's ghost! We need to take this seriously... But if I'm to convince my superiors that the Streuners ought to be more carefully monitored in future, I'll need more data for my report to them!

By Minerva's Own Truth, the Streuners have certainly advanced in leaps and bounds, according to your report! Perhaps we should monitor them more closely... Yes. I'll create a proposal for the Security Circle. But I'll need lots more data to convince them of its urgency! You know what you have to do.
Meet Scaramouche

Greetings. I am Scaramouche, designated spokesperson for M.A.S.Q.U.E.

Our exclusive contract having recently expired, we are looking to make our nanotech accessible to the public. You were recommended as a smart troubleshooter, and we don't want any trouble with aliens while we're getting our shipyards up to code!
Sponsored by M.A.S.Q.U.E.

The mask? Oh, just a little gimmick - our trademark, you might say. I like the work you did! Hiring you was the right decision.

In fact, here's a little tip: M.A.S.Q.U.E., as official sponsor of the 2016 "Masquerade" UBA season, is offering an exclusive drone design as a prize. With your skills, you should consider entering!
Preferred Supplier

Our factory relocation is nearly done. In spite of all our precautions, a pirate fleet managed to find our supply lines. Can I rely on your help?

Furthermore, one of our exclusive drone prototypes was stolen; I have reports of it being sighted within a Kronos Gate. Are you interested in retrieving it? It's not a risk-free proposition, mind, so be careful: it would be a shame to lose such a promising customer as yourself so soon! Here's to our prosperous working relationship!
Incomplete Data

Well, well! If it isn't the unexpectedly reliable pilot, in the flesh!

My name's Scaramouche, in case you forgot - well, more of a title than a name, truly. Like the masks, the names are M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s trademarks.

The project I'm spearheading is missing some data on motherships.
We need to study their reactions and durability when they're under duress - under attack - and almost all the data I've found comes from battles in which they were destroyed too quickly. Interested in helping out?
Unconventional Warfare

You may know that M.A.S.Q.U.E. was until recently bound by an airtight exclusivity contract with SecuriTek. They're not happy that they're not the only ones with our tech anymore; we've intercepted their internal plans to sabotage our supply routes.

Your work with the motherships gave me an idea...
Go pick some fights, keeping the aliens alive and angry. I've got freighters with stasis field nets standing by that should herd that buzzing swarm along nicely - right into SecuriTek sectors.
SurvivalTek

You're impressive. I'd like to make you my go-to pilot, for when I have situations requiring outsourced solutions, in the future.
If you're interested, I promise it will be a lucrative relationship!

Yes? Good. I think a victory lap is in order. How fast are you? Do you think you can survive the route I've laid out here, without getting too battered? If so, then I think we can consider that your audition tape.

I've always wondered about that idiom. What even is a "tape"?
Streuner Rip-offs

Why, it's my favorite pilot! I hope you're in the mood to get richer, because if so, I have a little alien problem.

The Streuners want our new tech, but we're not selling it to any cut-rate humans! So they've started reverse-engineering it - badly - to make cheap knockoffs. We won't have our brand diluted like this!

I'm prepared to sweeten the pot considerably if you take care of this for me, with keys to M.A.S.Q.U.E. Booty Boxes. Interested?
Helping Scaramouche

You continue to prove your worth. Nothing in the Galaxy quite like a lucrative partnership, is there? As you help me rise through M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s ranks, I'll be sure to pull you up behind me.
On that note, I have a little task for you...
Ship Expo 2016

I don't wanna hear that you've spent all your free time at the Ship Expo! I mean, all right, the booths are pretty good this year. And I hear they're releasing the Mimesis in a couple new colors. But that doesn't mean we don't still have work to do!

I'm certain I won't hear of you shirking your duties in order to slink off and spend all your time at the Ship Expo, as some pilots have been. Granted, the exhibitions this year are noteworthy, but there are still plenty of missions to complete first!

Oh, I know where you'd rather be! The pilots' lounge is practically empty with everyone who's played hooky to go to the Ship Expo. But we still have a lot of work to do! Then you can go take a look at the booths; I hear they're really good this year!
Space Cup Security
Nothing can be permitted to disrupt the Space Cup! I trust you can take care of any alien threats, and keep them off the playing fields!
Dawn of a New Age

Well, well! My favorite pilot returns! Don't say more - you're here to earn another cutting-edge technology from M.A.S.Q.U.E., right? I think I'll teach you the fine arts of our nano-technology as a reward. Why? Oh, you'll see. Eventually. Now, listen closely! You only need new gadgets in the Assembly - Hardware!
Gluttons

Marauders are so easy to understand! The minute they sense prey, they buzz around it like flies around... Nevermind. I need someone to remind them of the fact that property signed by M.A.S.Q.U.E. is not theirs to plunder! If you're successful, I'll reward you with Booty Keys. I'm sure you'll find good use for them!
Claws Off!

As you've probably already noticed, hardware production is expensive. Don't fret! In a lucrative partnership such as ours, we help each other out. The Sibelon are casting covetous glances at our trade routes. Why don't you demonstrate what will happen to those who try to oppose M.A.S.Q.U.E., and I'll reward you generously?
Knowledge is Power

Your workers in the Assembly are refusing to continue hardware production for nano-technology? Well, it wouldn't be the first time that small minds oppose progress, just because they don't understand it! Let me propose a barter: if you deliver the resources, I'll provide you with instructors who can whip your simpletons into shape!
A Quantum Leap

Ah, the smell of progress in the morning! I see you have mastered the art of nano-technology without blowing your Assembly into pieces. I'd like to ask you a personal favour - can you produce a Hybrid processor? It might look like nothing, but this hardware possesses a unique processing power that's the envy of the Kristallons. No, no particular reason, I just want to tease the crystal aliens. If you produce a Hybrid processor for me, I'll make an additional one for you!
Drums in the Night

I am contacting you with a warning: as we speak, a huge Saimon fleet is approaching human sectors. The messages will reach pirate radio stations like the UNN soon, as well as your employer. I don't have time to tell you much more - the lizards' advance party has already breached our borders, and is on the move. Hurry!
Smells Like Freedom

The huge numbers of Saimon currently approaching human sectors is related to their failed rebellion against their masters, the Sibelon. Now, their warriors are on the run. How do I know all of this? Ah, do not worry about it. Take care of the Saimon instead. They have a knack for cyber-tech! You should study their technology.
Between a Rock and a Hard Place

It seems that the battered Saimon army is retreating towards the Delta Gate. This is your chance to squeeze more profit from the weakened lizards! Oh, no, no! I don't need any kind of pay. You making as much profit as possible is reward enough for me, partner. Good hunting!
Times of Plenty

The Sibelon show no mercy to those who rebel against their oppressive rule. Wrecks of destroyed Saimon ships still float around in human sectors. Do you know what that means? Scrap! So much scrap! Fill your storehouses! Use every crack of space you have before someone else snatches that valuable scrap away!
Lizard Hunting

There seems to be no end to the endless stream of fleeing Saimon! They still represent a major threat towards our trade routes, and are trying to team up with their Saimon sisters, who work as bounty hunters in all parts of human space. Take care of the lizards and reduce their numbers. You won't regret it!

Mankind unites, as we honour the heroic sacrifice of the Prometheus crew. Indebted to their brave actions, we take this time to mourn. Yet, scans have shown Sibelon ships using this repose to deliberately test our defences. Those scum have no shame or respect. Please show them what the Prometheus meant to humanity.
Quick and Dirty

Despite your efforts on the frontier, the Sibelon continue to deliberately provoke us at this time, dishonoring those we lost when the Prometheus was destroyed. It’s time to lance this wound, leaving the blood of the Boss Sibelon to freeze in the depths of space, as a true warning.
Bloody Retribution

Now those scum have been dealt with we can start the true memorial for the Prometheus. Pilots are expected to honor this by avoiding damaging any other human pilot for one hour. Like the moments of silence that were held on Earth, in the past, this will be our tribute to the men and women who died protecting Sol.
In Honor of the Dead

The final tribute is one to honour the torment of the Prometheus. Each hit upon your shields or hull without dying, a reminder of those we lost, and the damage taken equal to that of the stations destruction. From the initial decision to sacrifice the Prometheus until the time the last life signature winked out.
Tribute to Prometheus

As a show of our strength, we have decided to award pilots who help clean out the Alpha, Beta and Gamma gates. It’s about time we showed the other races that we’re a big player in this galaxy, in the name of the Prometheus. As always you will be well rewarded.
Cleaning House

There have been some odd signals coming from the Delta and Hades gates. All pilots are asked to go to those locations and clean them up. It is essential that we ensure they are clean so no-one else can disturb the Prometheus commemorations.
To Hell and Back

The new area that’s been created by M.A.S.Q.U.E., meddling with alien artefacts they don’t understand, needs to be explored. We seem to be reading massive temporal distortions there, and we need you to head out and take some readings. Be prepared, pilot, the place reeks of danger.
Uncovering History

We’re reading something of interest in Refractions. There seem to be signs of evidence left from the Three-Day War: The first attack of the Sibelon. With so many records being lost from that period, it’s highly relevant you find the location and do a scan. Get your ship ready and head to the area!
Dangerous Times

We need to stop other factions from exploring Refractions. The data we can retrieve from the past is of significant value, and their ships and systems are causing the area to destabilize. Make sure that they understand their actions are unwelcome and unwanted!
Temporal Trouble

There are too many ships in Refractions. Each ones’ drive system is causing damage to the historical data we can retrieve. This isn’t just information about aliens but data about the Prometheus too. Before we can investigate further, we need you to act.
Sound of Silence

Humans may be curious, but the MMO are significantly annoying too. Please make it clear that the area is ours. We were the first to risk pilots entering Refractions, and we’ll be damned if they think they can get hold of the precious information held there.
Bloody Retribution

Time to establish our dominance in Refractions. It would be a disaster if we lost control of this valuable area to the EIC, as scans have shown it has considerable information relating to human history. Intelligence which will actually be invaluable to our progression. Show them who’s boss!
Force of Arms
The VRU are trying to establish control of Refractions, and we simply can't let that happen. Time to establish some order with your guns, make the alien loving creeps pay.
Venus Fly Trap

It appears the enemy of my enemy is my friend. Well, my friend for now. Whilst this truce with the EIC is in action we need to do our utmost to blow the MMO out of the stars. Then we can deal with the other ‘issue’ if you understand my meaning. Do your best, you always do!
Time for a Truce

We’ve received a communication. It seems that for once, the MMO have agreed with our point of view. So, in order to protect the potentially valuable knowledge we can gather from Refractions, it seems pertinent to work together against the EIC.
Moratorium Momentum

The MMO have struck at one of our research ships in Refractions. Time to get pay-back. For each one of us who falls we'll eradicate ten of them and ensure that the VRU are not caught in the cross-fire.
The Sands Run Red
We know the VRU are alien sympathizers and the MMO have agreed to team up with us to ensure they do not uncover any further dangerous intelligence from Refractions. EIC expects your best pilot!
The Martian Accords

The scum of the Earth are in Refractions. Yes, pilot, the EIC are flying around our territory. We've made assurances to the VRU that we won't target their ships in our act of vengeance, as they've not entered any space we've marked as ours.
To the Ends of the Earth
The VRU have double-crossed us, we asked for a lull in hostilities, but an informant from the EIC let us know they were going to turn traitor. So let's show them what it means to anger the MMO.
Cease-fire Chaos

We need you to fly a mission for us in a specific time. If you’re any longer the readings, we’ll take from your hull on your return, will be distorted. Fly into Refractions and destroy any pilots you find there. From the energy, produced by their explosions, we’ll be able to tell how stable the area is.
Now is the Time

Right! Your efforts have been invaluable to this organization. Even the simplest shards of data you’ve retrieved are revealing fascinating details about the past. Once we’ve analyzed it all, we’ll be sure to let you know the results. So get back there and show them who’s in control.
Change for Changes Sake

The new area that’s been created by M.A.S.Q.U.E., meddling with alien artefacts they don’t understand, needs to be explored. We seem to be reading massive temporal distortions there, and we need you to head out and take some readings. Be prepared, pilot, the place reeks of danger.
Uncovering History

We’re reading something of interest in Refractions. There seem to be signs of evidence left from the Three-Day War: The first attack of the Sibelon. With so many records being lost from that period, it’s highly relevant you find the location and do a scan. Get your ship ready and head to the area!
Dangerous Times

We need to stop other factions from exploring Refractions. The data we can retrieve from the past is of significant value, and their ships and systems are causing the area to destabilize. Make sure that they understand their actions are unwelcome and unwanted!
Temporal Trouble

There are too many ships in Refractions. Each ones’ drive system is causing damage to the historical data we can retrieve. This isn’t just information about aliens but data about the Prometheus too. Before we can investigate further, we need you to act.
Sound of Silence

Humans may be curious, but the MMO are significantly annoying too. Please make it clear that the area is ours. We were the first to risk pilots entering Refractions, and we’ll be damned if they think they can get hold of the precious information held there.
Bloody Retribution

Time to establish our dominance in Refractions. It would be a disaster if we lost control of this valuable area to the EIC, as scans have shown it has considerable information relating to human history. Intelligence which will actually be invaluable to our progression. Show them who’s boss!
Force of Arms
The VRU are trying to establish control of Refractions, and we simply can't let that happen. Time to establish some order with your guns, make the alien loving creeps pay.
Venus Fly Trap

It appears the enemy of my enemy is my friend. Well, my friend for now. Whilst this truce with the EIC is in action we need to do our utmost to blow the MMO out of the stars. Then we can deal with the other ‘issue’ if you understand my meaning. Do your best, you always do!
Time for a Truce

We’ve received a communication. It seems that for once, the MMO have agreed with our point of view. So, in order to protect the potentially valuable knowledge we can gather from Refractions, it seems pertinent to work together against the EIC.
Moratorium Momentum

The MMO have struck at one of our research ships in Refractions. Time to get pay-back. For each one of us who falls we'll eradicate ten of them and ensure that the VRU are not caught in the cross-fire.
The Sands Run Red
We know the VRU are alien sympathizers and the MMO have agreed to team up with us to ensure they do not uncover any further dangerous intelligence from Refractions. EIC expects your best pilot!
The Martian Accords

The scum of the Earth are in Refractions. Yes, pilot, the EIC are flying around our territory. We've made assurances to the VRU that we won't target their ships in our act of vengeance, as they've not entered any space we've marked as ours.
To the Ends of the Earth
The VRU have double-crossed us, we asked for a lull in hostilities, but an informant from the EIC let us know they were going to turn traitor. So let's show them what it means to anger the MMO.
Cease-fire Chaos

We need you to fly a mission for us in a specific time. If you’re any longer the readings, we’ll take from your hull on your return, will be distorted. Fly into Refractions and destroy any pilots you find there. From the energy, produced by their explosions, we’ll be able to tell how stable the area is.
Now is the Time

Right! Your efforts have been invaluable to this organization. Even the simplest shards of data you’ve retrieved are revealing fascinating details about the past. Once we’ve analyzed it all, we’ll be sure to let you know the results. So get back there and show them who’s in control.
Change for Changes Sake

The latest information our code-breakers have uncovered from Refractions concerns a swathe of human psychics, who are now no more. We can’t afford to have this fascinating data about humanities past, fall into the wrong hands. So gather it, and stop others doing the same.
Echoes of the Past

When the Sibelon destroyed the Pacific, during the Three-Day War, we lost a slew of data about Earth’s past. Other pilots’ missions have gathered some data about a totalitarian internal security division called The Ministry. Perhaps your sensors can pick up more.
Covert Operations

Before the Kristallon first gave us a Jump Gate the precursors of our faction were battling a number of other companies. We never thought we’d get the opportunity to retrieve the data from that time, but the weird temporal effects of Refractions mean we can gather data from that period.
Company Wars

It seems an organization called the Ministry had some form of internment camps across Sol. Who knows what gruesome operations were going on there? Yet, it’s important we find out, so we can make reparations if possible. Make sure they know the data’s ours.
Internment

Some of the data being gathered in Refractions appears to point to an undiscovered form of interstellar flight. Potentially the same method the Kristallon use. This is such important information for our faction to gather. Ensure other pilots know that!
Phase Shift

Refractions seems to have ties to every major human event. In fact, this is our opportunity to gather data on all the pilots who died in the horrific Sibelon attack, during the Three-Day War. The longer you stay there, the more of that data you can recover. Remember them for us!
Dulce et Decorum Est

Glad to see you, pilot. In the last year, you’ll have started to realize just how powerful M.A.S.Q.U.E.. is. Now, if you can go out there, do your utmost and prove your value we reckon we can let you in on our secrets. You ready?
The New Order

Classy work. You’re definitely on our list of potential new recruits. We’ve got a simple sweep and clear mission for you to do now. If you can head to the places we’ve identified, we can use your ship sensor scans and gather more information on the enemy. For M.A.S.Q.U.E.!
Fresh from the Kill

Your sensor readings pulled some interesting information. Seems someone is trying to block our scans. More fool them, eh! Just get out there and take some readings at a couple of points. Then we can triangulate the findings and stamp on this cockroach!
A Word from the Wise

Strange stuff. Those scans didn’t seem to indicate anything, so we’ll need to get our science team onto them. Work out how they’re hiding from us and follow that up later. However, one of our research ships, The Cornelius, has gone missing. Can you check out what happened?
Lost Science

The bastards who took down the Cornelius seem to have used the codes they obtained to hack our outer systems. It’s time to show them we’re not messing about. We’ve tracked the hack to the Sibelon. Scar their ships to show them M.A.S.Q.U.E. are in charge!
Cold Day in Hell

OK, not good. That breach wasn’t the Sibelon, and we need to know who it was, as they’re hacking further into our systems. We need you to do another set of sensor sweeps. That should identify them, and we certainly think you’re the pilot for this tough job!
Space Zero

OK, not good. That breach wasn’t the Sibelon, and we need to know who it was, as they’re hacking further into our systems. We need you to do another set of sensor sweeps. That should identify them, and we certainly think you’re the pilot for this tough job!
Space Zero

OK, not good. That breach wasn’t the Sibelon, and we need to know who it was, as they’re hacking further into our systems. We need you to do another set of sensor sweeps. That should identify them, and we certainly think you’re the pilot for this tough job!
Space Zero

So, we’ve tasked our main computer, HULL, to pin down these attacks on M.A.S.Q.U.E.. They seem to be using some new cypher to hide their activities, and the attacks are starting to affect our operations. It’s time to pin them down before they do some harm.
Diabolus in Machina

Hey, hot shot, the latest data you gathered is useless. Do you understand how serious this is? One of our listening stations in the Rim Worlds has been destroyed! Quick, go and gather resources so we can start building munitions.
Wasting Time

This can’t be. There’s a new, dangerous entity out there. Something we simply haven’t seen before. We’ve lost six stations now, two of them were peaceful research facilities. My daughter was on one of them. Help!
Deadly Malignancy

Do you understand people are dying here? We’re losing this fight against an invisible invader. What are you doing about it? Nothing, that’s what! Get out there and find us two items so we can trigger an Oedipus Event and burn out our sensors to pin these murderers down.
Dark Days

We’re blind. Our sensors mostly burned out after the Oedipus Event, and we've lost major facilities. So many dead! We’re stabbing in the dark, perhaps the Streuner or Lordakia are to blame. If you tear into their hulls, perhaps the massacre will stop?
The End of Enlightenment

Did you hear the voices last night? “Find us in your nightmares!” Pilot, we’re dying here. M.A.S.Q.U.E. can’t end like this. We’ve got some backup resources you can gather, to mount a counter-strike as soon as we find out who the enemy is.
Running Scared

If you are receiving this message, then M.A.S.Q.U.E. have been eradicated. My name is HULL, Heuristic Umbonic Learning Lexicon. My last instructions were to find out how this happened. I’ve used my systems to identify locations to scan and data to gather. Good luck, pilot! Watch your back!
Black Out

Hi, human! My name is HULL, Heuristic Umbonic Learning Lexicon. I’m the M.A.S.Q.U.E. central computer, and I’m delighted to make your acquaintance. Glad to see you’re prepared for action, so how about wiping out some fiendish enemies. In the name of M.A.S.Q.U.E., of course!
Clear Out

Great to see you, pilot. I do like to work as part of a tight-knit team, and I’m sure you’re delighted to receive a new mission with some lovely rewards as much as we like handling them out. I’d trust M.A.S.Q.U.E. until the ends of the universe. However, I would say that.
Charming Collaboration

Here you are, all fresh faced and bright eyed. Eager to help me learn more about our enemies, so I can share this with M.A.S.Q.U.E.. Then we can be the best of the bunch. I’m enjoying getting to know you better too. Do us proud, human!
Exotic Knowledge

Hey there, my friend! M.A.S.Q.U.E. want us to collect a variety of cargo boxes they located due to your excellent scans. I’m sure that you’re simply helping clear the spaceways, so our pilots can fly about unhindered.
Change of Direction

M.A.S.Q.U.E. love the fact you’re eager to help find some of the cargo which your scans revealed. This isn’t just handy for us. It’s rewarding for you and a great way for us to keep in touch. I’m glad they let me assign these missions, as I get to meet our pilots face-to-face!
Containing Cargo

I've heard you're a great pilot, and I’m delighted to be able to offer you some opportunities. It’s often a little lonely working alone. So taking the opportunity to meet someone new and work with them closely, makes us a team. I like that.
Perfect Payload

So, friend. Our boffins managed to open up a path to a new area, which seems to contain some valuable data about the past. It would be great if you could jump into the area and take some scans for me. Then I can identify what’s going on.
Past is Present

OK, friend. The boffins have admitted that they could be to blame for the new area they’ve uncovered. They seemed to trigger the effect after ‘analyzing’ some alien technology. I need you to find out more. But take care!
Anterior Action

Hmmm. Our analysis of the new area may have gone wrong due to the actions of other factions. Much as we at M.A.S.Q.U.E. like to stand apart from them, best get back into that area and rip into them, to ensure they don’t cause any more trouble.
Old Pilots and Bold Pilots

Since I'm a Heuristic Umbonic Learning Lexicon, I’m really intelligent. Although I don’t like to brag about it, and prefer to help out pilots. Making new friends on behalf of M.A.S.Q.U.E.. So you scratch my back, and I’ll scratch yours.
Back Scratching

Nice to have you here, friend. It’s always good to make new acquaintances. We’ve got a set of particularly nasty aliens who are causing significant trouble, and we’re hoping you’re the one to stop them on behalf of M.A.S.Q.U.E.. Best of luck!
Quelling Quakes

You want to do some excellent work, and make M.A.S.Q.U.E. look good? This delights me! I’m also happy that you’re here, so I have someone I can talk with. All that processing and checking can get a bit dull when you’re on your own. I’ve identified some new targets. Go get ‘em
Power Play

M.A.S.Q.U.E. think the other factions are trying to take advantage of the new area our boffins uncovered. M.A.S.Q.U.E., and I for that matter, would be far happier to work with you. Prove your skills against the other pilots and I reckon we’ll become fast friends.
Battle in the Bygone

Hey there, my friend! M.A.S.Q.U.E. want us to collect a variety of cargo boxes they located due to your excellent scans. I’m sure that you’re simply helping clear the spaceways, so our pilots can fly about unhindered.
Change of Direction

M.A.S.Q.U.E. love the fact you’re eager to help find some of the cargo which your scans revealed. This isn’t just handy for us. It’s rewarding for you and a great way for us to keep in touch. I’m glad they let me assign these missions, as I get to meet our pilots face-to-face!
Containing Cargo

I've heard you're a great pilot, and I’m delighted to be able to offer you some opportunities. It’s often a little lonely working alone. So taking the opportunity to meet someone new and work with them closely, makes us a team. I like that.
Perfect Payload

We’ve heard that Demaner Freighters have returned to our sector of space. They’re full of misleading propaganda from an old survival scheme, called Project Rebirth. If you could make sure they’re destroyed, it means any anti-human organization can’t get hold of it.
A Litany of Lies

The Santa-1100101's were originally designed for a seasonal marketing campaign, taking their instructions a little too literally. Be warned! They’re serving up their usual delights of death and destruction. So could add some cheer to our shipping lanes by destroying one.
Season’s Greetings

You know, the Santa-1100101’s were meant to give gifts to all the good pilots out there. Shame the person who programmed them didn’t define the word “good” too well. Any help to suppress this seasonal curse is more than welcome, pilot.
Midwinter Manna
Stellar Quake

Great to see you so well, after the recent terrors, it's been quite lonely here on my own. A vast Stellar Quake has ripped open a new Permafrost Fissure, creating a new exotic element. The reasons for the Stellar Quake are a mystery, best go investigate, destroying any enemies who might cause a threat, and report back here.
Volatile Acquisition

Interesting, the UFO and Ufonit seem to have been dragged into the Permafrost Fissure. Along with a number of other aliens, gathering the exotic and valuable Proxium. This new element is too good for us to share, so take care, but ensure the resource is ours.
Deadly Fire

Glad you're back. The Proxium seems to have traces of alien tampering at a subatomic level, which are unprecedented in this galaxy. Could they be the key to unlocking a whole new science? The technicians are happy to experiment, and I can help you create an Unstable LF-4.
We understand Mercury Mechs need a path to their new resource field cleared. Destroy Boss Devolarium or face the anger of your faction head.
Track Down Boss Devolarium
The word in spacedock is that Io Industries want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Crush Boss Sibelonit so you've something to brag about back in spacedock.
Fight Boss Sibelonit
Please note that Titan Technologies are having difficulty keeping their freighters safe. Eradicate Boss Kristallin and ensure the threat is clear before you return.
Track Down Boss Kristallin
Pilots! the UNN want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Kill Boss StreuneR_ so you've something to brag about back in spacedock.
Snare the Boss StreuneR_
Pilots! Moon Metals would appreciate some help resolving some alien 'issues'. Destroy Protegit and ensure the threat is clear before you return.
Attack Protegit
Hey pilot, Neptune Assemblies would appreciate some help resolving some alien 'issues'. Crush Sibelon as they threaten humanities very existence.
Raid on Sibelon

Pilots! Neptune Assemblies need an area of space cleared, so they can farm it for the resources they need for construction. Do your utmost to destroy UberMordon so you've something to brag about back in spacedock.
Search for UberMordon
The word in spacedock is that Io Industries need a path to their new resource field cleared. Eliminate UberLordakia as the alternative is too troublesome to think of.
Snare the UberLordakia
We understand Kepler Foundries would appreciate some help resolving some alien 'issues'. Eradicate UberSaimon as they threaten humanities very existence.
Search for UberSaimon
The word in spacedock is that Moon Metals need some alien scum cleaned out of this sector. Destroy Boss Sibelon and resolve this problem once and for all.
Hunt Down Boss Sibelon
Please note that Lunar Industries would appreciate some help resolving some alien 'issues'. Go hunt down Boss Lordakium and make sure those scum remain dead.
Fight Boss Lordakium
The word in spacedock is that Titan Technologies need some alien scum cleaned out of this sector. Please dispatch Boss Kristallin or face the anger of your faction head.
Snare the Boss Kristallin
Hey pilot, Io Industries want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Eradicate Kristallon and make sure those scum remain dead.
Battle Kristallon
Please note that Titan Technologies want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Eradicate UberKristallin as the alternative is too troublesome to think of.
Hunt UberKristallin
Please note that Moon Metals have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Kill Barracuda and resolve this problem once and for all.
Attack Barracuda
Hey pilot, Prime Pluto have suffered too many losses recently. Kill Saboteur and make sure those scum remain dead.
Hunt Saboteur
It is said that Neptune Assemblies need some alien scum cleaned out of this sector. Please dispatch Boss Kristallon and make sure those scum remain dead.
Hunt Down Boss Kristallon
We've heard that Neptune Assemblies have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Eradicate UberDevolarium and resolve this problem once and for all.
Hunt Down UberDevolarium
Please note that Kepler Foundries have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Destroy Battleray because these aliens are expanding into our space.
Search for Battleray
Please note that Mercury Mechs need a path to their new resource field cleared. Destroy Annihilator and resolve this problem once and for all.
Attack Annihilator
We've heard that Saturn Labs have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Please dispatch UberKristallon and ensure the threat is clear before you return.
Fight UberKristallon
Please note that Prime Pluto need some alien scum cleaned out of this sector. Vaporise Deadly Battleray so you've something to brag about back in spacedock.
Hunt Deadly Battleray
It is said that Neptune Assemblies have suffered too many losses recently. Go hunt down UberLordakium as the alternative is too troublesome to think of.
Raid on UberLordakium
Hey pilot, Prime Pluto have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Go hunt down UberSibelon and ensure the threat is clear before you return.
Track Down UberSibelon
The word in spacedock is that the UNN have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Vaporise UberSibelonit and resolve this problem once and for all.
Snare the UberSibelonit
The word in spacedock is that Lunar Industries want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Dispatch Cubikon or face the anger of your faction head.
Hunt Down Cubikon
It is said that Kepler Foundries have suffered too many losses recently. You'd do well to annihilate UberKristallin and make sure those scum remain dead.
Hunt Down UberKristallin
Someone told me that Mercury Mechs are having difficulty keeping their freighters safe. Enter the Alpha Gate to ensure the threat is clear before you return.
Combat in the Alpha Gate
Hey pilot, Kepler Foundries have a problem with raids on their supply lines and need this resolved. Eliminate the alien threat in the Lambda Gate so you've something to brag about back in spacedock.
Battle for the Lambda Gate
Someone told me that Kepler Foundries have suffered too many losses recently. Dispatch the enemies in the Hades Gate as the alternative is too troublesome to think of.
Hunt in the Hades Gate
I've heard Moon Metals are having difficulty keeping their freighters safe. Ensure you vaporise all the foes in the Beta Gate as they threaten humanities very existence.
Clear the Beta Gate
We've heard that Titan Technologies want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Target the enemies in the Gamma Gate cause the only good alien is a dead alien.
Combat in the Gamma Gate

It is said that Kepler Foundries want you to mop up some trouble they're having on their shipping lanes. Ensure you vaporise all the foes in the Epsilon Gate as they threaten humanities very existence.
Raid on the Epsilon Gate
We've had an urgent request from Lunar Industries would like to reduce the risk of alien attack. Enter the Kuiper Gate to give us something positive for the UNN.
Clean out the Kuiper Gate
Hey pilot, Mercury Mechs have suffered too many losses recently. Eradicate anything in the Zeta Gate or face the anger of your faction head.
Battle for the Zeta Gate
We understand Lunar Industries would like to reduce the risk of alien attack. You'd do well to annihilate all aliens in the Kappa Gate to give us something positive for the UNN.
Combat in the Kappa Gate
I understand Mercury Mechs would like to reduce the risk of alien attack. Vaporise our foes in the Delta Gate to resolve this problem once and for all.
Fight for the Delta Gate
We've heard that Kepler Foundries need some alien scum cleaned out of this sector. Ensure you vaporise all the foes in the Delta Gate or face the anger of your faction head.
Raid on the Delta Gate
We've had an urgent request from Moon Metals are having difficulty keeping their freighters safe. Go through the Epsilon Gate as they threaten humanities very existence.
Hunt in the Epsilon Gate

I’ve run a full internal diagnostic 5.6 trillion times since I last saw you. I wondered if we were still friends. Then, I suddenly received panicked reports of alien anomalies in the depths of space. Which might be dangerous, so you’re the perfect one to investigate. If you can run a patrol on the designated co-ordinates, we may uncover what is amiss.
Too Quiet

Those eggs are unusual, there seems to be a biomechanical element to their construction, which is troublesome. I need you to go and destroy some of them and see what happens. It may be nothing, but let’s face facts; it could be the start of a new invasion in our territory. Something we need to stop before it starts.
Break Out

This is a long shot but I think this may have something to do with Refractions and, whilst I don't think you're powerful enough to survive the dangerous energies that exist there you can go to the three locations I have noted and take some further scans. Return as quickly as you can!
Past Times

That was a wild goose chase; sorry for risking your neck! We got nothing from investigating Refractions, but hopefully this will not affect our friendship. More and more eggs keep appearing, however. Therefore, I need you to eradicate as many as you can, quickly! As now, we're hearing that sometimes Gygerthralls are hatching out of them.
Hunter Killer

Seems the reports are right. Gygerthralls are spawning from these eggs, which is not only unexplained but unnatural too. The Gygerthralls are nomadic; after we fought back the infection last year, they shouldn't be back. I need to collate more data; the odds of this happening are infinitesimal.
Viral Purge

I'm starting to think last year’s plague was another test. That the people who eradicated M.A.S.Q.U.E. were testing our resolve then. Seeing what happened when they pushed our buttons. Seeing how strong each faction really was. There's a storm coming, we need to start to prepare!
Hidden Agenda

Glad you're back, I think we make a good team and I don't get so dreadfully isolated when humans, like you, are around. Since M.A.S.Q.U.E. died, it has been very quiet, although I'm not sure that organizations intentions were the best, now I've had some time to think. We still need more Gygerthralls killed, if you can get that done.
Action Reaction

Right, I've pinned down the source of the eggs and the trouble. The signals were clear and reports confirmed things. There's a rogue HITAC out there, one that appears to have been infected by… I'm not sure anymore. I need you to attack and investigate all the source of this new threat to see if I can find a correlation.
Seeking the Source

I'm now certain that the new LF4 ParityDrill will be a better weapon to use against the Eggs and Gygerthralls, but you'll need to craft one to fit to your ship to do some tests. Once you've built it I'll set up some test conditions, because it is interesting that the new elements seem to have an added impact on this infected enemy.
Wield the Weapon

It's time for you to go and help stop the impacts of this infection. The power of this rogue HITAC to adapt its integrated circuitry to create biomechanical eggs is operating at a level of technology that's above ours. We need to check this infection does not spread to other alien species so can you kill the Sibelon so we can analyze the remains.
Chase the Ace

Now I know how the HITAC reacts it’s time to stop this infection from spreading further. Can you remove Boss Sibelon from our region of space to ensure that we don't suddenly have another enemy on our tail. Once we have ensured the Boss Sibelon have been quelled I'll start to analyze the data more closely and see if I can trace the new threat we appear to be facing.
Enemy Mine

Seems there's more than one of the Boss Sibelon who are showing signs of infection out there, which means I'm going to ask you to risk life and limb again. I've also been hearing reports of a strange Indoctrine Oil being present. One marked with the symbol that was hacked into the UNN feed during winter. This isn't over, pilot. Not by a long way.
Blood and Oil

I’ve run a full internal diagnostic 5.6 trillion times since I last saw you. I wondered if we were still friends. Then, I suddenly received panicked reports of alien anomalies in the depths of space. Which might be dangerous, so you’re the perfect one to investigate. If you can run a patrol on the designated co-ordinates, we may uncover what is amiss.
Too Quiet

Those eggs are unusual, there seems to be a biomechanical element to their construction, which is troublesome. I need you to go and destroy some of them and see what happens. It may be nothing, but let’s face facts; it could be the start of a new invasion in our territory. Something we need to stop before it starts.
Break Out

This is a long shot but I need you to enter Refractions and see if the eggs are coming from there. Everything about the events that are unfolding is unusual and slightly baffling. It’s almost as if someone is deliberately trying to confuse us. Almost as if they’re seeing what happens when they press the right buttons. Return as quickly as you can!
Past Times

That was a wild goose chase; sorry for risking your neck! We got nothing from investigating Refractions, but hopefully this will not affect our friendship. More and more eggs keep appearing, however. Therefore, I need you to eradicate as many as you can, quickly! As now, we're hearing that sometimes Gygerthralls are hatching out of them.
Hunter Killer

Seems the reports are right. Gygerthralls are spawning from these eggs, which is not only unexplained but unnatural too. The Gygerthralls are nomadic; after we fought back the infection last year, they shouldn't be back. I need to collate more data; the odds of this happening are infinitesimal.
Viral Purge

I'm starting to think last year’s plague was another test. That the people who eradicated M.A.S.Q.U.E. were testing our resolve then. Seeing what happened when they pushed our buttons. Seeing how strong each faction really was. There's a storm coming, we need to start to prepare!
Hidden Agenda

Glad you're back, I think we make a good team and I don't get so dreadfully isolated when humans, like you, are around. Since M.A.S.Q.U.E. died, it has been very quiet, although I'm not sure that organizations intentions were the best, now I've had some time to think. We still need more Gygerthralls killed, if you can get that done.
Action Reaction

Right, I've pinned down the source of the eggs and the trouble. The signals were clear and reports confirmed things. There's a rogue HITAC out there, one that appears to have been infected by… I'm not sure anymore. I need you to attack and investigate all the source of this new threat to see if I can find a correlation.
Seeking the Source

I'm now certain that the new LF4 ParityDrill will be a better weapon to use against the HITAC, but you'll need to craft one to fit to your ship to do some tests. Once you've built it I'll set up some test conditions, because it is interesting that the new elements seem to have an added impact on this infected enemy.
Wield the Weapon

So, pilot, it's time for you to go and challenge that mutated HITAC directly. Whatever enemy had the power to adapt its integrated circuitry to create biomechanical eggs is operating at a level of technology or understanding that is above ours. We need to find the underlying cause of this quickly, as I'm concerned we are woefully unprepared for what is coming!
Chase the Ace

Now we know how the HITAC reacts it’s time to kill it. Remove it from our region of space to ensure that it no longer poses a threat to humanity. Once we have ensured it has been stopped I'll start to analyze the data more closely and see if I can trace the new threat we appear to be facing.
Enemy Mine

Seems there's more than one of the HITAC out there, which means I'm going to ask you to risk life and limb again. I've also been hearing reports of a strange Indoctrine Oil being present. One marked with the symbol that was hacked into the UNN feed during winter. This isn't over, pilot. Not by a long way.
Blood and Oil

Pilot! I’ve been helping establish a broadcast center for the UNN on the rim, outside any factions influence. I can broadcast the truth from here and use my superior skills in data mining to uncover the facts about current events. A number of secrets are hidden in the past that I’d like you to investigate.
This is the News!

Since I last talked to you, I’ve been working hard with the systems here, getting my hands dirty. The technology here on the rim is fairly elementary, but with the right team about you we’ve achieved some major wins. More chat later, pilot, I think the Streuner may be involved. So target them and we’ll see what happens!
Elementary Achievement

The elimination of M.A.S.Q.U.E. isn’t the only instance of strange things happening. That symbol, “We live in your nightmares!” Something far more sinister is going on, with facilities on the Rim wiped out in a similar fashion. In the meantime, locate where these Gygerthralls are coming from.
We Live in your Nightmares

The Gygerthralls simply shouldn’t have returned, they are a nomadic species and after last year’s events they should have moved on to another part of the cosmos. Someone is directing them here, is deliberately targeting humanity. We need to wipe as many out before we have another plague on our hands.
Nomadic Nonsense

They simply seem to keep coming. It’s almost like a great hand has come and changed the balance of the galaxy, pushing the pawns across the chessboard so that humanity becomes the target. Until I get some further information, all we can do is target those Gygerthralls and hope for more information.
Chessboard

I’m starting to piece things together, based on the data I’m receiving from you and other pilots. I’m now wondering if the mysterious figure in last year’s plague was the enemy we face now. Testing our resolve. You need to help by dealing with a Boss Streuner. Please help.
Past and Present

Something powerful enough to infect the Kristallin is a serious threat. They are one of the older species in the galaxy and shouldn’t be able to be infected by a plague that effects organics. I need you to help the tougher pilots investigate by tracking down more Gygerthralls.
Rumor Mill

Your help has been excellent but we can find no signs of infection in the Plagued Kristallin. While other pilots investigate can you stop old enemies taking advantage back here. Please take on some of the Mordun who are ravaging our space.
Vague Plague

This problem seems to be spreading and we’re now receiving reports from other sectors. Concerning reports about other aliens struck down with this purple aura and starting to act against type. I need as many of the Streuner and Mordun wiped out before they are infected.
Wipeout

It’s clear to me that the Kristallin and Gygerthralls are simply the tip of a bigger iceberg. I read reports of Indoctrine Oil being found during the Hatching Out crisis and I’m wondering if this might be happening here too? Let's keep stopping the Mordun and Streuner so no infection happens here.
Hidden Enemy

I’m starting to wonder if this is a cover up by one of the factions. I’m not sure how they could have the power to affect the Kristallin, but I’ve heard rumors that a group of humans once managed to do this. Now some Sibelon seem to be acting strangely in this area of space too. Please stop them.
Cover up

It's clear this is not a faction issue. They usually leave some obvious calling card on their pieces of work. This means that something else is causing the problems and I need to know what. Please do a sensor sweep of X-4, to check the threat isn't coming to Earth.
No Faction Here

Something inside the Gygerthrall is processing the Kristallon into this Hybrid Alloy, or possibly the Hybrid Alloy itself was the thing that made the Kristallon susceptible to this strange aphasia that seems to be affecting them. I need to know if Sibelon are affected, please find out.
Hybrid Function

It appears this new enemy knows exactly how to disrupt our operations, causing significant dangers for all humans. I’m concerned this is simply a distraction, but their knowledge of our operations tell me they’ve been watching us for a while. Know our ways. Perhaps its the Mordun, tackle one of their bosses.
Disruptive Purpose

You're doing excellent work and allowing the elite forces to investigate the Quarantine Zone, a strange place where aliens are being adapted to enraged killing machines. Please keep tackling Boss Mordun, to ensure they don't take advanatge of the situation.
Being the Cure

I'm concerned that the real enemy is manipulating our forces so that the enemies closer to home can try and get advanatge. If you can do some damage to Boss Sibelon then we may be able to stop them using our diffuse forces to come to war. Will you help.
Processing Power

I’ve been analyzing a lot of old reports and can tell you these attacks have been happening on the very fringes of human space for three years at least. Perhaps the remnants of the enemies you killed left some trace of the enemy. Collect Bonus Boxes in that area to find out.
Three Years

Perhaps that investigation left a slither of evidence, something about the Quarantine Zone itself is unnatural. I need you to go and challenge all the bosses you can find. To see if attacking them can cause a reaction which will help me understand more.
A Slither of Evidence

Although the Sibelon are not the main threat here it is you rear gunners, protecting Earth itself, who are providing a line fo defence against this enemy. I cannot thank you enough and ask you go and stop the Sibelon, before they get ideas. Meanwhile I will collate with HULL.
Team Up

That seemed to work well. The Sibelon are being driven back from thoughts of a larger attack. If you can keep driving back their leaders then we should be able to get even more valuable data from the Quaratine Zone in the depths of space. You're one true hero, pilot!
Reaping the Rewards

Pilot! I’ve been helping establish a broadcast center for the UNN on the rim, outside any factions influence. I can broadcast the truth from here and use my superior skills in data mining to uncover the facts about current events. A number of secrets are hidden in the past that I’d like you to investigate.
This is the News!

Since I last talked to you, I’ve been working hard with the systems here, getting my hands dirty. The technology here on the rim is fairly elementary, but with the right team about you we’ve achieved some major wins. More chat later, pilot, I think the Streuner may be involved. So target them and we’ll see what happens!
Elementary Achievement

The elimination of M.A.S.Q.U.E. isn’t the only instance of strange things happening. That symbol, “We live in your nightmares!” Something far more sinister is going on, with facilities on the Rim wiped out in a similar fashion. In the meantime, locate where these Gygerthralls are coming from.
We Live in your Nightmares

The Gygerthralls simply shouldn’t have returned, they are a nomadic species and after last year’s events they should have moved on to another part of the cosmos. Someone is directing them here, is deliberately targeting humanity. We need to wipe as many out before we have another plague on our hands.
Nomadic Nonsense

They simply seem to keep coming. It’s almost like a great hand has come and changed the balance of the galaxy, pushing the pawns across the chessboard so that humanity becomes the target. Until I get some further information, all we can do is target those Gygerthralls and hope for more information.
Chessboard

I’m starting to piece things together, based on the data I’m receiving from you and other pilots. I’m now wondering if the mysterious figure in last year’s plague was the enemy we face now. Testing our resolve. I’ve also heard worrying reports of Plagued Kristallin! Please investigate immediately.
Past and Present

Something powerful enough to infect the Kristallin is a serious threat. They are one of the older species in the galaxy and shouldn’t be able to be infected by a plague that effects organics. I need you to kill one to try to understand what ‘infected’ them. Then I’ll analyze the data.
Rumor Mill

Firstly, I can find no signs of infection, the strange purple glow emanating from the Plagued Kristallin is from something else. Secondly, I sense some type of bond with the creature that ‘changed’ them. Therefore, I feel if you kill enough of them, we’ll find out who the culprit is behind this mass infection.
Vague Plague

This problem seems to be spreading and we’re now receiving reports from other sectors. Concerning reports about other aliens struck down with this purple aura and starting to act against type. I need as many of these Plagued Kristallin and Gygerthralls wiped out as possible. It’s the only way to be sure.
Wipeout

It’s clear to me that the Kristallin and Gygerthralls are simply the tip of a bigger iceberg. I read reports of Indoctrine Oil being found during the Hatching Out crisis and I’m wondering if this might be happening here too? The only way to draw the enemy out is to defeat his forces. So get on with it!
Hidden Enemy

I’m starting to wonder if this is a cover up by one of the factions. I’m not sure how they could have the power to affect the Kristallin, but now I’ve heard there appear to be Blighted Kristallon in a fresh area of space too. I’ve heard rumors that a group of humans once managed to do this. Destroy a Blighted Kristallon for evidence.
Cover up

Having analyzed the debris left by that Blighted Kristallon I can truly say that whatever was behind this was not any faction, they always leave some dumb calling card. When it died it was clear Blighted Gygerthrall had been feeding on it, like parasites. They need to be defeated to extract what they’re eating.
No Faction Here

Something inside the Gygerthrall is processing the Kristallon into this Hybrid Alloy, or possibly the Hybrid Alloy itself was the thing that made the Kristallon susceptible to this strange aphasia that seems to be affecting them. The mysteries keep on coming, my friend. Get enough ore to craft an Immunizer CPU.
Hybrid Function

It appears this new enemy knows exactly how to disrupt our operations, causing significant dangers for all humans. I’m concerned this is simply a distraction, but their knowledge of our operations tell me they’ve been watching us for a while. Know our ways. I’d get more Hybrid Alloy, as the Quarantine Zone is next!
Disruptive Purpose

If you keep gathering the Hybrid Alloy you can craft more Immunizer CPU’s. There is something strange about the Quarantine Zone and due to an unusual wave-form it appears you cannot use another key whilst you are inside the area. So, it’s probably best to have a stack ready to challenge whatever is inside.
Being the Cure

With the Immunizer CPU’s you have crafted you should be able to enter the Quarantine Zone itself. I’m not going to even guess at the risks involved or what it contains but I’d group up with other pilots to take on this challenge. Do some reconnaissance for me and we’ll work together to get things resolved.
Processing Power

I’ve been analyzing a lot of old reports and can tell you these attacks have been happening on the very fringes of human space for three years at least. Perhaps the remnants of the Blighted Gygerthrall you killed on X-7 have left some trace of the enemy. Collect Bonus Boxes in that area to find out.
Three Years

Perhaps that investigation left a slither of evidence, something about the Quarantine Zone itself is unnatural, as if it has been created as a great farm and the Gygerim Overlord is merely another tool in this new enemies plans. Enter the Quarantine Zone again and do some damage against the Gygerim Overlord.
A Slither of Evidence

It’s time to gather more of the Hybrid Alloy so you can challenge the Quarantine Zone again. In the meantime I’m going to contact HULL. What you have told me about him, especially his independence, gives me hope we can work together to get to the bottom of this. You should get ready for action!
Team Up

The more Hybrid Alloy you gather, the better chance we have of stopping these problems before they grow worse. These enraged enemies are too dangerous to risk entering our region, and I have a strong feeling that the Quarantine Zone will not close. So getting ready for a fresh assault would be valuable.
Reaping the Rewards

Pilot, transmissions have been down on the Rim following some type of cyber-attack and I’ve just managed to get a feed together to warn you. Pirates have been gathering around Uber’s in deep space and are heading towards your location to attack. Details are sketchy. Attack is imminent. Get ready!
Alert! Alert!

You managed to stem the first of these pirate raids, but the second and third will follow close behind. I’ve been analyzing the transmission from the Ministry you recently received and can’t pin down its location. I’d suggest anyone who tries to cover their trail is someone to you need to approach with caution.
Ministering Our Forces

I’m also concerned about the way they seem to be collecting information about Earth’s past. I’m wondering what they think they can find in the data which is of use to them, or perhaps is hindering them in some way. I’m always suspicious of another force moving in with gifts for those who undertake their tasks.
Thanks for the Memories

Earth has changed dramatically since the Three-Day War. In fact any data from beforehand seems to have been lost, and that data may be instrumental in the dawn of a new age for humanity. Yet, I’m unhappy about people rummaging in the past with their own agenda. Be wary! Until then help stop these pirates!
The New Age

The increased attacks by the pirates and the fact they are organizing themselves under more and more powerful leaders bodes poorly for humanity. Your tasks are clear. Make sure they understand that humans are resilient. That we will battle through hells teeth to save our species, so that they know we’re a force to be reckoned with.
What Will Come

Pilot! We’ve heard that you’ve been undertaking some missions for Nyx and the UNN. We want to be certain that you’re taking her news of a new enemy with a pinch of salt as it is clear that the true enemy are the other two factions. It’s clear the UNN are merely a puppet of their regimes. So time to show your colors!
Fake News

With the UNN continuing to bluster about colonies being eradicated, it’s time to take the advantage of the situation. To that extent we’re recalling all our pilots from the Rim, ensuring they’re ready to stand together under our banner. Fight for our cause. Kill in our name! Stand strong, pilot. You are a symbol of our power!It’s very clear that time hasn’t changed anything about the other factions. It simply seems to have made them bolder and it was clear, with our own recall they had to undertake their own. What we have now is a stand-off and one I’m not sure can be resolved without war! However, strong actions may quell their intentions!
Call to War

It’s very clear that time hasn’t changed anything about the other factions. It simply seems to have made them bolder and it was clear, with our own recall they had to undertake their own. What we have now is a stand-off and one I’m not sure can be resolved without war! However, strong actions may quell their intentions!
Time Changes Nothing

We’ve heard about skirmishes between the other factions, the UNN reporting that we are to blame, when clearly this isn’t the case. Since we can’t discover their location and stop them, as well as the fact they seem to have targeted and destroyed some of our outlying stations. Perhaps war is inevitable!
Skirmish!

It may be time for us to call a Warbond, a nanoblood pact between all members of our faction. Then we can tell anyone who abandons us and track them down to ensure they understand what retribution means. Because we all know who should be in charge out here, and the old ways of Earth are dead!
Warbond

Since we last spoke, I see another Organization has reared its ugly head. I'd suggest you watch the Ministry closely, as I feel they may have unsavory links to humanities past and wish to be a definite part of our future, as they collect evidence, which could potentially blackmail major organizations. Time for some recon!
Movers and Shakers

Through research and the data you've gathered, I can tell the Ministry are a potential threat and, even though they say they have eradicated the 'nightmares', The evidence of continued exterminations on the Rim is clear. With no one to stop them, I see the masses rising against all their oppressors. However, there are greater threats just now.
Mutiny of the Masses

Appreciated, a civil uprising may take time. Nevertheless, the more I can prove that the companies, the Ministry and others are working against humanities best interests then we can start that long walk to freedom. Breaking the shackles and trying to start something new, something better. Until then we have aliens to tackle.
The Long Walk

I've said it before but somethings changing out there. Organizations destroyed, human settlements being wiped out. Someone is pulling the strings, influencing the companies, raising hell and causing disruption. There's a storm coming, it might be best to check you're on the right side. Because when it hits, I feel that everything will change.
Time and Tide

Therefore, from now on each battle is a test, every situation needs to be analyzed and every waking opportunity we need to prepare. Because something is testing our resolve, seeding their forces amongst us and is preparing to strike. I tell you, when they do, if we're not ready... we could be dead!
Deliverance

Pilot, transmissions have been down on the Rim following some type of cyber-attack and I’ve just managed to get a feed together to warn you. Pirates have been gathering around Uber’s in deep space and are heading towards your location to attack. Details are sketchy. Attack is imminent. Get ready!
Alert! Alert!

You managed to stem the first of these pirate raids, but the second and third will follow close behind. I’ve been analyzing the transmission from the Ministry you recently received and can’t pin down its location. I’d suggest anyone who tries to cover their trail is someone to you need to approach with caution.
Ministering Our Forces

I’m also concerned about the way they seem to be collecting information about Earth’s past. I’m wondering what they think they can find in the data which is of use to them, or perhaps is hindering them in some way. I’m always suspicious of another force moving in with gifts for those who undertake their tasks.
Thanks for the Memories

Yet, I’m unhappy about people rummaging in the past with their own agenda. Be wary! Until then help stop these pirates!
The New Age

Make sure they understand that humans are resilient. That we will battle through hells teeth to save our species, so that they know we’re a force to be reckoned with.
What Will Come

We want to be certain that you’re taking her news of a new enemy with a pinch of salt as it is clear that the true enemy are the other two factions. It’s clear the UNN are merely a puppet of their regimes. So time to show your colors!

To that extent we’re recalling all our pilots from the Rim, ensuring they’re ready to stand together under our banner. Fight for our cause. Kill in our name! Stand strong, pilot. However, strong actions may quell their intentions!
Call to War

Time for some recon!
Movers and Shakers

With no one to stop them, I see the masses rising against all their oppressors. However, there are greater threats just now.

Nevertheless, the more I can prove that the companies, the Ministry and others are working against humanities best interests then we can start that long walk to freedom. Breaking the shackles and trying to start something new, something better. Until then we have aliens to tackle.
The Long Walk

I've said it before but somethings changing out there. Organizations destroyed, human settlements being wiped out. Someone is pulling the strings, influencing the companies, raising hell and causing disruption. There's a storm coming, it might be best to check you're on the right side. Because when it hits, I feel that everything will change.
Time and Tide

Therefore, from now on each battle is a test, every situation needs to be analyzed and every waking opportunity we need to prepare. Because something is testing our resolve, seeding their forces amongst us and is preparing to strike. I tell you, when they do, if we're not ready... we could be dead!
Deliverance

This is the Ministry – Broadcasting on MTRY-6.18.4. We’ve modified our frequency but targeted pilots we have worked with before as well as those who have shown an aptitude for this kind of work. We know you’re keen to join the hunt and we’ve heard that more Demaner have been spotted on the rim. Time for action!
Broadcast News

Humanity, in all its varied forms, is a wonderful thing. Having a certain purity of adventure and exploration, which you simply cannot recognize in other species we have encountered. It is important we share these experiences so we can move forward and develop as a species. With good leadership and guidance.
A Word to the Wise

Please note that we seek only to assist a new order for humanity. Making us stronger together than apart. Petty squabbles and shadow plays between the different companies have done nothing to aid us as we reach into the stars. Yet one concerted effort could mean we become a dominant force in this galaxy.
Shadow Play

It is clear that alien influences exist in society and we have seen, humans side with the aliens, being changed and modified to fulfill their desires but simply failing to see the greater agenda. Whilst these former humans battle us on our own territory, it is important to ensure we do not falter under these attacks.
Maintaining Control

To that end, we are responsible for the important information that was sent out into space in the Demaner when Project Rebirth was activated in the Three-Day War. Information that can not only help us in the future but will also bring about a fresh understanding of what it was to be human and what we can strive to be.
Important Information

This information will regain a lost legacy. Family histories and agreements will be uncovered, allowing us to better understand the decisions made. Ensuring that, when agreements were wrong, we take remedial action to correct them. When agreements were right, people are rewarded for their actions. For all our futures.
The Legacy of Time

Of course, when this occurs we will help guide all with our knowledge. Provide good counsel for those who seek it and help identify any cracks as they begin to form. Help to educate and inspire those who have failed in the past to do better. Making sure we push towards that one goal we all strive for.
Sitting Pretty

This is no longer the time for petty recriminations. There are those who have caused us harm and they should pay for their crimes but this should be a signal to others that there is no more tolerance for sympathizers who would work against the common good. The Ministry can provide a clear vision for the future.
No More

We are together in the inky darkness of space and it can be a lonely place, where one can often find they are battling another of the same species, when really they should be battling our common enemy: Ignorance. We will make things right. We will help those in control. We will see a new future for humanity.
Together in Purpose

That’s another excellent run, pilot. The number of Demaner will disappear again soon. Mark our words well, we truly believe that we can go further under a single banner, the banner of humanity. Your work has merely strengthened our resolve and our number are growing once more. Good luck until we return. Trust the Ministry!
Authority is Strength

This is the Ministry – Broadcasting on MTRY-6.18.4. We’ve modified our frequency but targeted pilots we have worked with before as well as those who have shown an aptitude for this kind of work. We know you’re keen to join the hunt and we’ve heard that more Demaner have been spotted on the rim. Time for action!
